Likewise, cheese makers wash the dairy floor with whey. Tomato gardeners compost with rotten tomatoes. No writing is wasted: the words you can't put in your book can wash the floor, live in the soil, lurk around in the air. They will make the next words better.
author: Erin Bow

quote: Our key to greatness lies not in our ability to project ourselves to others as if we are putting ourselves onto a projector and creating an image of ourselves on a projector screen. Rather, our key to greatness lies in who we are which we can give to other people in a way that when they walk away from us, they are able to say in their hearts that they have taken away something with them quite extraordinary.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Living is about capturing the essence of things. I go through my life every day with a vial, a vial wherein can be found precious essential oils of every kind! The priceless, fragrant oils that are the essence of my experiences, my thoughts. I walk inside a different realm from everybody else, in that I am existing in the essence of things; every time there is reason to smile, I hold out my glass vial and capture that drop of oil, that essence, and then I smile. And that is why I have smiled, and so you and I may be smiling at the same time but I am smiling because of that one drop of cherished, treasured oil that I have extracted. When I write, I find no need to memorize an idea, a plot, a sequence of things: no. I must only capture the essence of a feeling or a thought and once I have inhaled that aroma, I know that I have what I need.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: You can't understand where someone's going unless you understand where they've been.
author: Jerry B. Jenkins

quote: A wise man first thinks and then speaks and a fool speaks first and then thinks.
author: Hazrat Ali ibn Abu-Talib

quote: I’m not going to die because I failed as someone else. I’m going to succeed as myself.
author: Margaret Cho

quote: Don't step backward toward nothing, step forward toward something, better awkward steps forward, than coward steps backward.
author: Victoria Addino

quote: Am I getting braver, or just getting accustomed to being terrified?
author: Randy Alcorn, Deadline

quote: Laughter is good for both the body and the soul.
author: Mike Meyer

quote: I looked long and hard for the paper roses! I found the reddest red ribbon, and a little golden card! We were all there together, many of us, in the same place; but I was the only one who found the paper roses, the only one who chose the reddest red ribbon, and the only one who topped off with a golden card. And so I learned that if people are unhappy, it is only because they don't know how to look for the paper roses, they don't see the reddest red ribbon, and they don't like the little golden cards. We are all in the same wrap-shoppe in this life. But we are different. Because some of us are looking for the paper roses, choosing the reddest red ribbon, and picking up the little golden cards.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: We make choices every day, some of them good, some of them bad. And if we are strong enough, we live with the consequences.
author: David Gemmell

quote: Hatred is a louder exhibition of inability.
author: Qaisar Iqbal Janjua

quote: Anger was the indulgence of a child, not a queen.
author: Erika Johansen, The Invasion of the Tearling

quote: Take courage, my heart: you have been through worse than this. Be strong, saith my heart; I am a soldier; I have seen worse sights than this.
author: Homer, The Odyssey

quote: वसुधा का नेता कौन हुआ?भूखंड-विजेता कौन हुआ?अतुलित यश-क्रेता कौन हुआ?नव-धर्म-प्रणेता कौन हुआ?जिसने न कभी आराम किया,विघ्नों में रहकर नाम किया
author: Ramdhari Singh 'Dinkar', रश्मिरथी

quote: Joy is the fountain of youth.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Live joy. Be kind. Love unconditionally.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: The elimination diet:Remove anger, regret, resentment, guilt, blame, and worry.Then watch your health, and life, improve.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Every single person is sacred. Sacred means special, precious, a treasure of true beauty. That means you.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: But we were different now. I wanted only his pain, and judging from the girl he’d come home with last night, Madoc was still the same. A user.
author: Penelope Douglas, Rival

quote: You're the insane one. You don't even love the world you created. So how can you expect us to love and respect you?An endless repetition of natural destruction and stupid, meaningless wars. Because we don't understand it, we have no way to stop it.We may be stupid and not know what to do... But we fight to move forward towards that which we think is right. Not just sticking to the arbitrary boundaries you created.We make lots of mistakes, and get hurt... But we keep believing in miracles. Looking for a truth we can't yet see.We do it our own way. Because we believe our lives mean something.
author: Kaori Yuki, Angel Sanctuary, Vol. 20

quote: Sometimes an angel is found in the dark.
author: K.  Webster, Alpha & Omega

quote: Every challenge, every adversity, contains within it the seeds of opportunity and growth.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: 6 Ways To Give Your Mind A Break:1. Stop stressing2. Stop worrying3. Give rest to the problems weighing you down4. Lighten up5. Forgive yourself6. Forgive others
author: Germany Kent

quote: It's not the law of religion nor the principles of morality that define our highways and pathways to God; only by the Grace of God are we led and drawn, to God. It is His grace that conquers a multitude of flaws and in that grace, there is only favor. Favor is not achieved; favor is received.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Its never to late to get back on your feet though we wont live forever make sure you accomplish what you were put here for
author: Abigail Adams, My Dearest Friend: Letters of Abigail and John Adams

quote: With my ninth mind I resurrect my firstand dance slow to the music of my soul made new.
author: Aberjhani, Visions of a Skylark Dressed in Black

quote: Marmee: Oh, Jo. Jo, you have so many extraordinary gifts; how can you expect to lead an ordinary life? You’re ready to go out and – and find a good use for your talent. Tho’ I don’t know what I shall do without my Jo. Go, and embrace your liberty. And see what wonderful things come of it.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: God is colourblind. But we are not God. God does not need to see colour and difference. God is far bigger than all of that. We are human. We are destined to grow and learn from each other and with each other and there is no growing, there is no learning, there is no wonder and no majesty in life if we were like God. We were meant to see colour and difference.To deny these is to lack respect. To blind ourselves to these is to fool one another. To shun these is to deny ourselves growth and knowledge.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: You think that it’s not magic that keeps you alive? Just ‘cause you understand the mechanics of how something works, doesn’t make it any less of a miracle. Which is just another word for magic. We’re all kept alive by magic, Sookie. My magic’s just a little different from yours, that’s all.
author: Charlaine Harris

quote: Regardless of how black the page, he had always managed to turn it and move on to a new chapter in his life.
author: Robert Masello, Blood and Ice

quote: Mistakes are not bad
author: excuses are.

quote: When you treat your failures as lessons, you can never fail.
author: Udai Yadla

quote: Believe in your greatness. Because what you believe is what you become.
author: Udai Yadla

quote: Life is not measured by what you have. It's measured by what you give.
author: Aaron Dennis

quote: Be real, rare, refreshing you! Fan the flames of self love and ignite your light!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: If you seek happiness, look in the mirror. If you seek love, look elsewhere.
author: Thomas F. Shubnell

quote: Enchantment lies in everyday moments if you are observant.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Everything in this world happens with a purpose. You are born in this world with a purpose, you are chosen by purpose.
author: Udai Yadla, A Walk in the Rain

quote: Thank people who help you because they make you happy. Thank people who don't help you because they make you strong.
author: Udai Yadla

quote: When you have power and use it for destructive purpose: you don't deserve it.
author: Udai Yadla

quote: When it's possible for you to dream, it's not impossible to achieve.
author: Udai Yadla

quote: Be brave and take risks… You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: When you stop complaining about others for not helping you and focus on your efforts
author: there’s no stopping you.

quote: Don’t come back when you realize that I’m rare
author: Genereux Philip

quote: Kindness and caring are ambrosia for the soul.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Breathtaking, splendid, wondrous, sublime, all those words describe you, exactly as you are. You are a work of art! Enjoy your beauty!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Believe in your heart that you're meant to live a life full of passion, purpose, magic and miracles.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: You have not failed until you accept your failure.
author: Udai Yadla

quote: Don't care about success or failure. Keep doing what you love. Success will follow.
author: Udai Yadla

quote: Women united can create movements. We can empower entire generations. We can build peace one action at a time. Together we rise. The time is now.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Dance through life flinging kindness like shimmering rainbows. Find your bliss by sharing your heart.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Failure is the greatest teacher.
author: Udai Yadla

quote: If Cinderella were given a single shining epiphany (instead of a fairy godmother), she would have realized: "This is my father's house. This is my father's estate. I am the rightful heiress to everything here!" then she would have said: "Get off of my property, take nothing with you, and never show your faces to me again! You ugly, bitter, insecure, envious witches!" And I'm sure she would have been happier, sooner!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: It was him, it was always him, they only needed to stand there with their feet buried into the muddy moss and look at each other; to feel each other. Time stopped, movement disappeared and it was both the beginning of everything and the end of everything else. They had each other and there was no name, no title to it other than they just had each other. There was no necessity to be practical, what they had and what they were, was of their own and in their own and I think nothing in the world could have made Lucy happier than to have what they had, to be what they were.
author: C. JoyBell C., Saint Paul Trois Chateaux: 1948

quote: If we come from the water, I conclude that we come from different kinds of it. I will meet a person and in his eyes see an ocean, deep and never ending; then I will meet another person and feel as though I have stepped into a shallow puddle on the street, there is nothing in it. Or maybe some of us come from the water, and some of us come from somewhere else; then it's all a matter of finding those who are the same as us.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Where are you?" he asked. "I'm right here" she said. "I know, but it feels like one percent of you is somewhere else, where is that one percent?" he said. "I don't know....I think I'm always like that..." she answered. "I like that." "You do?" "Yes, because that way, I have to always look for the one percent to find it.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Love for yourself is the key to loving other. Love begins with you.
author: Miguel Ruiz, Prayers: A Communion with Our Creator

quote: Long before we even lose our lives, we lose our souls. Tragic but true. Some carry on—willing to make the sacrifices, putting what is perceived as important before anything else. Some tread into the dark—wasting moments of grace, letting themselves suffer from their own decisions or the other’s domination. Some continue to love, give too much, and not leave even a little love for themselves.
author: Joanne Crisner, Brightest

quote: Many things that don't really mean so much of anything, are wonderful.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Life doesn´t come with any guarantees. You have to risk it to get the biscuit." - The Alchemist, Paulo Cohelo -
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: There are many rivers that we cross in our lifetime, unfortunately some of those rivers just don't have bridges.
author: John R. Gouin

quote: The thing about life is, you’ve got to somehow make it through the day. Don’t wait for the beautiful evening. Go on with your life. Of course, the beautiful evening will come. In fact, she’s on her way. And she’s coming to you as fast as she can. And dude, she’s beautiful.
author: Thisuri Wanniarachchi

quote: When your footsteps and thoughts carry you down the same path your heart and soul are directing you, you will know without a doubt that you are headed in the right direction.
author: Molly Friedenfeld

quote: Failure is when you give up. A real winner is someone that doesn't give up, even when it feels like they are losing.
author: Joshua Hartzell

quote: Sometimes the only reason for us to be somewhere else is to see things from a different perspective.
author: Leila Summers

quote: Chaos is another name for opportunity
author: I-Ching

quote: Love is not a forest fire that burns intensely,hotly and out of control for a brief moment until,its expendable fuel spent,it sputters,seeking in vain for something else to consume,to sustain itself before, finally,it dies:cold, black ash the only evidence of its passing.Love is, instead, a campfire:it provides ample heat and comfortto the twosome who sit before it,and although its flames may at times wane,a well-tended campfire’s embers can be nurtured and fanneduntil the flames once again dance brightly and cheerfully,providing comfort to the couple who cherish the gentle warmth it ministers.
author: J. Conrad Guest, January's Paradigm

quote: Treat yourself today! You are a unique, sparkling, spectacular soul. Celebrate you!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Know what you want and reach out eagerly for it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Here is a universal law: that when it comes to negative and positive, you will always thrive more powerfully in the positive if you have first been immersed in, and have heroically overcome, the polar opposite negative of that thing. To abide in the positive existence of something, without having known and overcome it’s polar opposite— that is to be only a frame of the real structure. Easily toppled down and taken apart. True power is in the hands of the one who thrives in the positive, after having known and conquered the negative. Because when the demons come along, she will say to those demons: “I know you, I have owned you, but now you bow down to me.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: We all take a different path to the same place. Why we took the path we did will always be a mystery.
author: Michael R. Krozer, Diary of a Short Life

quote: Choose joyful abundance in your heart and be unbounded, free, and relaxed. Be relentless with your choice and you’ll make your mark.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Every man reaches his destination, if he just keeps walking
author: Philen Naidu, My Life My Africa

quote: Bring forward what is true. Write it so that it is clear. Defend it to your last breath.
author: Ludwig Boltzmann

quote: When we embrace who we are the world embraces us right back.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: The power of love can spread magic to the world like nothing else.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: Being able to write becomes a kind of shield, a way of hiding, a way of too instantly transforming pain into honey.
author: John Updike

quote: There will be haters, there will be doubters, there will be non-believers, and then there will be you proving them wrong.
author: Jennifer Van Allen, The Runner's World Big Book of Running for Beginners: Lose Weight, Get Fit, and Have Fun!

quote: Let us each take up our flaming torches and mount as the blazing fireballs of light that we are and let's burn the skies and leave it with deep scars and let them be our signatures upon eternity as we go forth!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Everyone who got to where they are had to begin where they were.
author: Richard Paul Evans

quote: The greatest thing you will ever give to the world is your committment to leave what you find in better condition than the way you found it. Leave a single light in a place where there was once darkness so those coming behind you may see further and begin where you left.
author: Tonny K. Brown

quote: You can capture this body of mine, take away my freedom and enslave me. You may even have the power to capture my soul and sentence me to the realm of eternal darkness. But my dreams you cannot touch. They are my will―the very essence of who I am. In them I laugh. In them I cry. In them I love. And in them.....I live.My dreams are untouchable and unceasing.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Eena, The Dawn and Rescue

quote: Pray for "all men." We usually pray more for things than we do for men. Our prayers should be thrown across their pathway as they rush in their downward course to a lost eternity.
author: E.M.Bounds

quote: I see myself as a Scottish sky: there are rain clouds, rainbows and sunrays that run and overtake one another, mingle together and dance with each other! You see all of this within seconds of looking up! It’s a living sky, it breathes and it’s real! And I think that when you look at me, you’ll see my rain clouds first, because only after rainclouds can there come the rainbows. You see, if the rainbows come first, then the rainbows aren’t even real, so I think that if people deserve to see my real rainbows, then they will just know that they need to stick around through the rain! Like a Scottish sky, I want to be real and breathing and running. I don’t want to be a clear blue all the time, or a dark grey all the time or have fake rainbows painted onto me; I want to be Scottish.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: When you trust your inner guidance and begin moving in the direction of your dreams (aligned with your individual gifts) you will be cloaked in an armor bestowed upon you by your guardian angel.
author: Charles F. Glassman

quote: YOU are your own guru. YOU are your own soul mate. YOU are powerful. Take the reigns and drive your carriage home to love.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Sometimes being happy takes effort. Invest time and energy in yourself and your happiness.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Choosing kindness is the ultimate expression of evolved consciousness. Grow by being kind.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: If you always do what is easy and choose the path of least resistance, you never step outside your comfort zone. Great things don’t come from comfort zones.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: You are limitless! Accept this truth and soar to infinity.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: It takes drive and focus to move from potential to reality.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: A circle's unity and never ending smoothness is how we can aim to feel inside. Smooth, gentle, accepted, no rough edges, only love for all parts of our selves.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: The secret ingredients to true happiness? Decisive optimism and personal responsibility.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: A kind thought, word, or action creates infinite ripples of caring, consideration, and peace.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Caring is what matters, not stuff or status, just people sharing kindness & joy in a web of the heart that spans the globe.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Swirl into joy today by sharing your caring with the world. Be a pillar of positivity.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Soul mate romance dissolves the superficial and touches your deepest heart with the delightful power of love.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Focus your heart, mind, and soul on joy and you'll find ultimate success and fulfillment.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: YOU are the magic code that unlocks your happiness.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: We have to be honest about what we want and take risks rather than lie to ourselves and make excuses to stay in our comfort zone.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: Choose love and joy as much as you can in each moment and watch your life transform.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue your goals.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: Integrity is doing the right thing when nobody's watching, doing as you say you would do.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: No matter where we live on the planet or how difficult our situation seems to be, we have the ability to overcome and transcend our circumstances.
author: Louise L. Hay

quote: Appreciate every little beautiful moment in every day of your life. Give it a try and you'll see the world from another perspective.
author: Thea Kristine May

quote: Everywhere we shine death and life burn into something new…
author: Aberjhani, Elemental: The Power of Illuminated Love

quote: We must not be defined by what we do, but we must be what and who we are, then only happen to do what we do!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Friendship is so important. The goal of a good friendship should be for life! To keep it for life! If you find a friendship, and it gives you a joy inside, a peace, and a freedom; keep that friendship for life. Through it all, you stay together. So many friendships are toxic, but the good ones are really good! I always tell my son this, I always say, a friend is for life!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: The world is before you, and you need not take it or leave it as it was when you came in.
author: James     Baldwin

quote: Peace is something like happiness; you cannot say "I will be happy when..." and you can't say "I will be peaceful when..." Your happiness shouldn't depend on the situation you're in nor on the circumstances that surround you. In the same breath, you cannot wait for everything around you to become peaceful in order for you to say "I am peaceful." In both happiness and peace, there is a heart of strength, determination and steadfastness; a heart that has the power to make things happen. You have to be at peace. You have to be happy. Now.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Someone needs to fight, someone needs to sacrifice, someone needs to inspire, someone needs to be a hero.
author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

quote: As I look back on my own life, I recognize this simple truth: The greatest opportunities were the scariest lions. Part of me has wanted to play it safe, but I’ve learned that taking no risks is the greatest risk of all.
author: Mark Batterson, In a Pit with a Lion on a Snowy Day: How to Survive and Thrive When Opportunity Roars

quote: Your environment will eat your goals and plans for breakfast.
author: Steve Pavlina

quote: There's a lot of talk these days about giving children self-esteem. It's not something you can give
author: it's something they have to build.

quote: Never allow others to create your world because if you do, they will always make it too small.
author: Christopher Robinson

quote: We cannot face up to what lies ahead, without facing up to what lies within.
author: Eleesha

quote: You can't be sad when Daisy is around, she won't let you.
author: Maryam Faresh, Daisy

quote: They don't have to know the real you for you to keep being that amazing you! Don't let someone's negative spirit disrupt or corrupt yours. Be you for...you. God is the one that you want to see who you really are.
author: Marala Scott, In Our House: Perception Vs Reality

quote: Always have something to look forward to
author: Vici Howard

quote: People do not meet by chance––they navigate their lives to certain people for certain reasons.
author: Ruti Yudovich, I Hate to Say Goodbye

quote: The one ironclad rule is that I have to try. I have to walk into my writing room and pick up my pen every weekday morning.
author: Anne Tyler

quote: I would rather live in a world where people shout, "This is wrong." than live in a world with superheroes saving the day.
author: ♥EJ <---

quote: No one of real intelligence will accept anything just because some authority declares it be so. Don't accept the truth of anything you have not confirmed for yourself.
author: Paul Hoffmann

quote: I don't so much mind looking back on having lost the election, or having been denied a role in the play, or having had my novel repeatedly rejected, or having been turned down for a date, or recalling laughter at my expense when I attempted some silly challenge.  Those things simply prove that I lived life.  What I do mind, however, is looking back on the lost opportunities where imagined concerns kept me from even trying—lose or win.  I've learned that there is no regret in a brave attempt, only in cowering to fear.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: A poet is simply an artist whose medium is human emotions.  A poet chisels away at our own sensibilities, shaping our vision while molding our hearts.  A poet wraps words around our own feelings and presents them as fresh gifts to humanity.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes

quote: No difference, good or bad. Thoughts like birds in mind. Some fly in. Some fly out. Some stay at water hole to drink. Beware of birds that linger.
author: Natalie Wright, Emily's House

quote: You don't need to understand what the world is, just let your life flow with it and become something
author: Jayson Engay

quote: H is for Habit, winners make a habit of doing the things losers don't want to do.
author: Lucas Remmerswaal, The A-Z of 13 Habits: Inspired by Warren Buffett

quote: I can't over-emphasize how important an exquisite perfume is, to be wrapped and cradled in an enchanting scent upon your skin is a magic all on its own! The notes in that precious liquid will remind you that you love yourself and will tell other people that they ought to love you because you know that you're worth it. The love affair created by a good perfume between you and other people, you and nature, you and yourself, you and your memories and anticipations and hopes and dreams; it is all too beautiful a thing!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Like everything else, Fletcher. Practice.
author: Richard Bach, Jonathan Livingston Seagull

quote: So you never know who you touch. You never know how or when you'll have an impact, or how important your example can be to someone else" (20).
author: Denzel Washington, A Hand to Guide Me

quote: It takes writing a billion bad words before you get to the good ones.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Facts? What are facts? I only know imagination!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: The conception of each star was at the point of no return
author: of a desperate soul struggling to master the winds!

quote: I hope I don't write TOO many books! When I look at authors who have written too many books, I wonder to myself "When did they live?" I certainly want to write BECAUSE I live! I know I don't want to write in order to live! My writing is an overflow of the wine glass of my life, not a basin in which I wash out my ideals and expectations.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: I believe in miracles.... I have to.
author: Terry Fox

quote: There is no power like that of prevailing prayer - of Abraham pleading for Sodom, Jacob wrestling in the stillness of the night, Moses standing in the breach, Hannah intoxicated with sorrow, David heartbroken with remorse and grief, Jesus in sweat and blood. Add to this list from the records of the church your personal observation and experience, and always there is cost of passion unto blood. Such prayer prevails. It turns ordinary mortals into men of power. It brings power. It brings fire. It brings rain. It brings life. It brings God.
author: Samuel Chadwick

quote: Opportunities? They are all around us ... There is power lying latent everywhere waiting for the observant eye to discover it.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Earth's crammed with heaven, And every common bush afire with God.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: There are gigantic trees that have grown tall into the winds and the clouds over the thousands of years of their lives, their tops are rustled and tossed by the mists of the atmosphere! Then there are the short trees that don't live for long, they are young with no deep roots and only a few annual rings to tell their stories.The tall, ancient trees sway in the realm of freedom while the short young trees cannot even raise their branches into that direction of the sky! Now, you are the bird who needs a tree to live in; if you choose to live in the tree which thrives in the realm of freedom, that doesn't mean you are not committed to that tree. You are still committed to your tree, but together you and your tree live in freedom. Freedom is not the absence of commitment. If you are the bird who chooses to fly around amongst the short trees and live in them, that's because your wings are too short to make it any higher and your vision too near to see any further into the clouds. And if you move from one short tree to the next short tree, that doesn't mean you are free, you are still down there below, freedom is still nowhere near you.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: I like to set my dreams high. That way, even if I only make it half way there, it's still pretty darned good.
author: Elizabeth O. Dulemba

quote: Once you discover that you can, you must.
author: Al Jarreau

quote: Each day is a giftTo embrace and welcome
author: Karen Hackel, The Whisper of Your Soul

quote: L'esercizio rende perfetti, ma nessuno è perfetto, quindi perché esercitarsi?
author: Green Day

quote: Judging is the cause that creates the effect of choosing.
author: Joey Lawsin

quote: Persistance is the quality of winners. Successful people never never give up
author: Lynda Field

quote: The more you try to please people, the more they get control of you and you'll end up hurting yourself.
author: Chanda Kaushik

quote: Commitment mixed with drive and sprinkled with imagination creates sustained results. Stay focused and you will make your mark!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Inspiration is sometimes as simple as a shared smile.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Laughter is the divine effervescing.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Spread kindness, caring, and compassion and create your own paradise. Infuse it with joy and you’ve created heaven on earth.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Being present to yourself in love and with kindness is the ultimate gift.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: ...and remember my sentimental friend that a heart is not judged by how much you love, but by how much you are loved by others.
author: L. Frank Baum, The Wonderful Wizard of Oz

quote: I wanted to figure out why I was so busy, but I couldn't find the time to do it.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: Thoughts frame your portrait, action paints it.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: My story was not the story of a girl's broken dreams: it was the story of a girl who couldn't be broken.
author: Heather Schuck, The Working Mom Manifesto

quote: A child has a deep longing to discover that the World is based on Truth. Respect that longing. In our attempt to help children grow into Inspired Adults, we wish them to carry the Youthfulness of their Souls, and the Wonders of Childhood into their old age.'Conscious Parenting by Natasa Pantovic Nuit Quotes about kids and world based on truth
author: Nataša Nuit Pantović, Conscious Parenting: Mindful Living Course for Parents

quote: A child is a Soul, a Unit Consciousness materialized on Earth to learn, fulfill its purpose contributing within the Matrix of Gaia. Our parents fought for ‘Expression of Thoughts’, ‘Equality’, we now have a task to fight for the Supremacy of Love over Control within all Areas of Life.‘Conscious Parenting by Natasa Pantovic Nuit Quotes about kids development soul
author: Nataša Nuit Pantović, Conscious Parenting: Mindful Living Course for Parents

quote: Go past the insecurity. Go past the little voice that says doing that thing will hurt you. Instead let the pain flow through you, and just hold on. At that very point, you will find yourself invincible.
author: Rishank Jhavar

quote: Fallon affected my body in weird ways. But only because she’s different, I told myself.
author: Penelope Douglas, Rival

quote: Your children are not your children.They are the sons and daughters of Life's longing for itself.They come through you but not from you,And though they are with you, yet they belong not to you.You may give them your love but not your thoughts,For they have their own thoughts.You may house their bodies but not their souls,For their souls dwell in the house of tomorrow,Which you cannot visit, not even in your dreams.
Forever friends are a treasure chest of understanding and compassion. Cherish them.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Sharing your kindness sparks understanding all around. Then like fireflies in the night, twinkling love surrounds you.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Life provides chances to open your heart all the time.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: An item is only worth what someone is willing to pay for it
author: Bianca Baker

quote: Don't let procrastination take over your life. Be brave and take risks. Your life is happening right now.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: When you encourage others, you boost their self-esteem, enhance their self-confidence, make them work harder, lift their spirits and make them successful in their endeavors. Encouragement goes straight to the heart and is always available. Be an encourager. Always.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: Your healthy love for yourself is sexy!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: No one makes it to the "top" by themselves. Each step you take is guided by at least one person's blood, sweat and tears. Appreciate those who stand behind you as you rise. They are the only ones who will catch you if you fall. The ladder of success is steadiest when someone's there to support it.
author: Carlos Wallace, Life Is Not Complicated-You Are: Turning Your Biggest Disappointments Into Your Greatest Blessings

quote: Your heart is a powerful force. Use it consciously.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: When you start giving, instead of getting, you make a difference… You can always give a warm smile, a sincere hello, a positive vibe… your concern, your attention, your time, your love, and kindness to those around you.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: When we aren't curious in conversations we judge, tell, blame and even shame, often without even knowing it, which leads to conflict." -The Power Of Curiosity: How To Have Real Conversations That Create Collaboration, Innovation and Understanding
author: Kirsten Siggins, The Power of Curiosity: How to Have Real Conversations that create Collaboration, Innovation and Understanding

quote: Set goals that make your heart sing. Then achieving them is an experience of uplifting joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue what you want.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: Don't let your mind talk you out of your dreams, trick you into giving up; don't let your mind become the greatest obstacle to success. To get your mind on the right track, the rest will follow.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, focus your energy on what you can create.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: Courage is feeling fear, not getting rid of fear, knowing something is more important than fear and taking action in the face of fear.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: Some people live in cages with bars built from their own fears and doubts. Some people live in cages with bars built from other people's fears and doubts; their parents, their friends, their brothers and sisters, their families. Some people live in cages with bars built from the choices others made for them, the circumstances other people imposed upon them. And some people break free.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: A genius is simply one who has taken full possession of his own mind and directed it toward objectives of his own choosing, without permitting outside influences to discourage or mislead him.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: I have found the paradox that if I love until it hurts, then there is no hurt, but only more love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Do not limit yourself to your own preconceptions of yourself, but throw yourself out onto a blank page that you haven't written on yet, and see what you find out about you, see what story unfolds, see what happens! I always do this, and sometimes it can be very frightening! To very often have a blank page with nothing written on it yet! I feel as though I am a soul with a single covering–my body of skin– and that's the only thing between me on the inside and the rest of the world! It's quite frightening to begin each day on a blank page, forgetting your own preconceptions of yourself and allowing your mind to embrace the new! It is like meeting yourself for the first time, over and over again!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: I never had any doubts about my abilities. I knew I could write. I just had to figure out how to eat while doing this., New York Times, April 19, 1992]
author: Cormac McCarthy

quote: The problem with thinking that you are the absolute best, is that it leaves no room for you to become any better and while you live life thinking that you're the best, truth is a lot of people around you are already better and becoming even more better.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: God would light the way. Faith would keep them on the right path.
author: Francine Rivers

quote: Nothing lasts forever. But the thing is, you can reuse some. Use your mind. - Leo's Mother, The Lost Hero
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Fairies with gossamer wings, Bring forth beauty, grace and joyful things. Fairies of the earth are caretakers of our soil, water and trees,They watch over beautiful creatures such as bears, bunnies and bees.Fairies ask that you breathe in and appreciate the vantage point from which you stand,Then trod carefully and respectfully with each intentional step you make across this beautiful land.
author: Molly Friedenfeld

quote: When the flames of life are gnawing away at your butt, run faster, quicker, and harder than you've ever run before, because I guarantee it that life will condition you, harder than any trainer ever will.When you state to yourself with the utter most believe, “I will achieve this,” than you are on the path, and this is when life throws obstacles left, right, straight on and which other way, but keep going. Because you will make it
author: Mark  Donnelly

quote: Never mourn the loss of innocence, because it always brings the much greater gain of wisdom.
author: Erica Goros

quote: I want to dream a dream so wonderful that I'll wake up sorry that it wasn't a memory.
author: Robin M. Helm

quote: I do not regret one moment of my life.
author: Lillie Langtry

quote: Doing what is right to GOD gives you peace not regret
author: Rudzani Ralph

quote: The first step to success it's to imagine it
author: Pete Hautman, The Big Crunch

quote: Life is not about waiting for the storms to pass... It's about learning how to dance in the rain.- Vivian Greene
author: Vivian Greene

quote: The good is the Enemy of the best. Until you depart from the good, you cannot enter God's best for your life.
author: Pedro Okoro, Crushing the Devil: Your Guide to Spiritual Warfare and Victory in Christ

quote: Success always hugs you in private,but failure slaps you in the public...
author: sahil banga

quote: Thought I wanted overnight success, until I achieved it through hard work and the refusal to back down! What you earn, you keep.
author: Angela M. Hudson

quote: Even though your life is Rainy and muggy you can fight through it just Make sure you know what is happening And make sure you don't take to much pressure on it just shake it off!
author: Skye Daphne

quote: This is heaven my child.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Never put off for tomorrow what is meant for today...tomorrow may never come.
author: C.J. Candel, LAST STAND of the WOLVES - An Oracle

quote: If everybody else your age is doing something very different than what you're doing, there's always going to be someone saying to you you might not succeed with it, you might not make any money with that... there's always going to be some type of obstacle in the way. All of those things will go away if you really focus on what makes you happy.
author: Kevin Clash

quote: I had always felt life first as a story: and if there is a story there is a story-teller
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Freedom is not the absence of commitment, and to be committed to something or to someone does not mean the loss of freedom. But freedom exists in the realm of the unbound and to be free is to be committed to that which is a part of the unbound realm. Whatever sets your soul to flight is freedom. If someone sets your soul to flight, to stay with that person is not to lose freedom but to stay with that person is to retain freedom. Together you have what is unbound. Whatever will swell your spirit and give you wings, is freedom, and it is a fault if you let go of that for the very reason that you are afraid of losing your freedom and in doing so you have in fact let go of what will keep you unbound.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: What we can change is our perceptions, which have the effect of changing everything.
author: Donna Quesada, Buddha in the Classroom: Zen Wisdom to Inspire Teachers

quote: I’m barely human. I’m more like a creature; to me, everything gives off a scent! Thoughts, moments, feelings, movements, words left unsaid, words barely spoken; they all have a distinct sense, distinct fragrances! Both a smell and a touch! To inhale is to capture, to experience! I can perceive and I can “touch” in so many odd ways! And so I am made up of all these scents, all these feelings! An illumination of nerve endings!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: It's not whether your glass is empty or full, it's what you do with it that really matters.
author: Sue Nelson Buckley

quote: Just do it! First you make your habits, then your habits make you!
author: Lucas Remmerswaal, The A-Z of 13 Habits: Inspired by Warren Buffett

quote: Freedom is a place, an area. It's a higher place. There are some other people that are here, and things that are here which are unseen. But you first have to set yourself free and believe in what you cannot see, believe that there is something more out there. In freedom can be found many devotions: a devotion to love, a desire to believe, a willingness to be happy, a perseverance to have peace. All these unseen things breathe and grow in the unseen soul. A free person is not an uncommitted person, but in a free person you will find a deep devotion, and a desire to be devoted to even more.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: ...No– but ours is a journey into ourselves, a walk with God every day! Ours is a book that we write, a smile, a love, a tear, a lust, an awakening, a learning, a joy, a laughter, a memory, a dream, a vision, a love, a love, a love and a love. Our life is now. And Heaven is always there, but this life isn't always there, but this life isn't always here. Heaven is always there for us but this life is a gift to us!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: It's time that I stop referring to myself, thinking about myself, planning for myself, according to the gridlines and the timelines and the guidelines of people. I will expand in this universe, I will not stay on the lines nor within the lines written by this world.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: It doesn't matter where your journey begins, so long as you begin it...
author: Solange nicole

quote: Anak muda adalah kegelisahan derap langkahnya adalah perubahan.
author: E.S. Ito, Negara Kelima

quote: Life is not about perfection. It's about persistence.
author: Natalie Wright

quote: I think that there are those who write of life being a skip on the sidewalk, a chocolate bar, a bowl of cherries... the problem with that is it ends up disappointing people. Because life is more like being on the tube in London; you never really know what could happen! But then there are those people who bring a box of chocolates to eat on the tube...so life, it isn't a skip on the sidewalk, but it is a matter of strength: "Can I bring my bowl of cherries to feast on while I stand here in the gutter?" that's the essence of life. Can you still put on your rose-colored glasses while your eyes are filled with tears, and see everything in rosy colors? That's the strength that fuels a true life. Can you think to bring your little box of chocolates with you while you sit on the tube running under the streets of London? Because you should. Because even if you don't know anybody, and you don't know what's gonna happen next, you should have your box of chocolates with you. You should eat your bowl of cherries. And that is what life is.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: True friends are always together in spirit." Lucy Maud Montgomery
author: Dianna Bellerose

quote: When you let go of past pain, believe in yourself, and follow your dreams—you can find true happiness!
author: Casi McLean

quote: Do what you love or die a slow death doing what you hate
author: Sonya Watson

quote: Tongues in trees, books in running brooks, sermons in stones, and good in everything.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Be in the World, Not of the World—Kind of like Lucky Charms cereal: there are lots of pretty marshmallows in with the cereal, but they’re not the same. So live with the cereal, but remember: you’re a pretty marshmallow.
author: Laura Jensen Walker, Becca by the Book

quote: Receiving is good but giving is much better. Nevertheless, sharing is the best.
author: Shahrizad Shafian, Tunjuk Langit Cinta

quote: Love is something you must accept in order to have, Naomi.
author: Nakia R. Laushaul, Running from Solace

quote: The concept of 'home' is not just where one resides, but where the heart resides; in the purest depths of the soul.♥
author: Michelle Cruz-Rosado

quote: Locating friendship at the heart of mission involves certain assumptions -- that reconciliation with God is something for which every human being is made and relationships are reciprocal.
author: Christopher Heuertz, Friendship at the Margins: Discovering Mutuality in Service and Mission

quote: Success for you is a RECIPE that ONLY YOU KNOW the ingredients for.So to you I say ,COOK UP the success that ONLY YOU know how to make and allow the world to see YOUR CREATION!
author: Jon-Robert Holden, Blessed Footsteps: Memoirs of JR Holden

quote: I don’t want to freeze my eggs. I don’t want to visit a sperm bank. I don’t want to be a single parent, if I have any choice in the matter. I want a nuclear family. I want to put down roots, to let my seeds germinate, to watch them bloom and flourish. Not one day, if and when I ever fall in love again, but now. While I still have my youth, damn it.
author: Monica Pradhan, The Hindi-Bindi Club

quote: My purpose is: What Lord? Where Lord? When Lord? Yes Lord!
author: Christine Brooks-Martin

quote: Strive to make small changes and learn something new daily, because there is always these experiences you have had to tap into for the future.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: I am convinced that one should tell one's spiritual director if one has a great desire for Communion, for Our Lord does not come from Heaven every day to stay in a golden ciborium; He comes to find another heaven, the heaven of our soul in which He loves to dwell.
author: Thérèse de Lisieux, The Story Of A Soul: The Autobiography Of St. Therese Of Lisieux

quote: Somewhere, deep within me, beyond the passion, beyond the beauty of the night, that little spark of Daily magic ignited in me again, began burning in a place that had gone dark and untended, that had yearned to be bright and warm. I felt it now, something old, something new, something complete. Perhaps it had been in there in me all along, the belief that there is a plan and a purpose, that God whispers into every life, some things that are beyond the scope of the mind, and can only be felt with the heart and the spirit. Those dreams, the dreams that are dreamed *for* us, not by us, are the truest of all.
author: Lisa Wingate, Talk of the Town

quote: All things are possible if you believe...
author: Candace C. Bowen

quote: Write because you love to write.
author: Cindi Lee

quote: A hero is not know by the number of battles he has won, but rather by the kind of battles he chooses to fight.
author: Tonny K. Brown

quote: If a nation has not God that nation must fall, but if a nation has God then all the powers of evil, and all the armies, cannot shake its foundations; no, not even if the whole world is arrayed against it.
author: Taylor Caldwell, Dear and Glorious Physician

quote: Friendship happens when the distance between the hearts tends to zero.
author: Amit Ray, World Peace: The Voice of a Mountain Bird

quote: Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Do not let the roles you play in life make you forget that you are human.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: To ‘let go’ sometimes makes us feel like losers because it means giving up what truly we felt we had a right to. But true strength lies in resisting the urge to hold onto things and people that bring us down.
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

quote: I've never met a person, I don't care what his condition, in whom I could not see possibilities. I don't care how much a man may consider himself a failure. I believe in him, for he can change the thing that is wrong in his life any time he is ready and prepared to do it. Whenever he develops the desire he can take away from his life the thing that is defeating it. The capacity for reformation and change lies within.
author: Preston Bradley

quote: The more time you spend thinking, the less time you spend doing. The less time you spend doing, the more you watch others do. This formula never equals success.
author: Beatrice McClearn, Diaries of an Emotional Prostitute

quote: Love drips like honey from the hive, constant, sweet, precious, into your heart each and every moment if you let it.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: waktu kita di bumi ini sakral adanya, dan kita seharusnya merayakan setiap detiknya
author: Paulo Coelho, The Witch Of Portobello

quote: Simbol, huruf dan angka adalah alat, sedangkan gagasan adalah roh sebuah tulisan.
author: I. Made Iwan Darmawan

quote: Embrace your diverse, prismatic colors! They make you uniquely you!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: As architect of your reality, you are empowered to create it as you choose.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Learn from stars; even in the dark they give off light, not despair.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Nurturing a feeling makes it proliferate. Choose wisely. Joy, kindness, love, & caring will illuminate your life.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Happiness is a collection of joyful experiences shared with soul friends. Get together and have some fun!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: We can accept and embrace our pasts as part of the path that shaped who we are now.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Mere talents does not give glory to God but a humble heart.
author: Mac Canoza

quote: A fish that is afraid of drowning in a river is ignorant of its gifts.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Bringing joy to another lights a thousand suns within.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Stop thinking of yourself as a victim. You were a target that is now no longer being hit.
author: Thomas Sheridan

quote: The circumstances surrounding your birth is not as important as the opportunity to live life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: It is in the darkest hour, when we are faced with our deepest most wrenching fears, that we are given the greatest strength. The choice is whether we succumb to the fear or rise with courage to face our truth and shine our brilliance as our sword of valor.
author: Monika Zands

quote: Change your attitude and you change your life. You cannot control what happens to you in your life, but you can always control how you respond to it. The way you choose to respond is a reflection of your attitude. By changing your attitude, you also change your perspective and change your life.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
author: Swami Vivekananda , Ramakrishna Paramhans, Sarda Devi

quote: Connecting our hearts through love yields a nectar so sweet we are forever full.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: True love begins when you accept yourself in your totality. Then, and only then, can you completely love another.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Love yourself deeply and be satisfied with the amazing life you create.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Dare to be a fool in the face of impossibilities.
author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quote: You don't have the right to complain about your life if you're not willing to change it
author: Tori Toth, Feel At Home: Home Staging Secrets for a Quick and Easy Sell

quote: Heart-flow means listening to your intuition and hunches and following your heart. How can you let your heart lead today?
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: An empowered sense of self-love means you truly love and accept yourself as you would a treasured lover or a sweet, wonderful child, and that you do this from a place of strength of character and belief in yourself.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Self-acceptance is pure power.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: The more you learn, the more you want to learn.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Truth even in the most whispered tones will always roar.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Giving thanks fills you with light and joy so you can shine like the bright star you truly are.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Transcendent, magical romance happens when you’re one hundred percent present for each other as #supersoul lovers.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: As for methods of prayer, all are good, as long as they are sincere.
author: Victor Hugo, Les Misérables

quote: If you're feeling helpless, help someone. ”― Aung San Suu Kyi (from Freedom from Fear)
author: Aung San Suu Kyi, Freedom from Fear

quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: You must embrace change before change erases you.
author: Rob Liano

quote: Dreaming is the poetry of Life, and we must be forgiven if we indulge in it a little.
author: John Galsworthy, Five Speeches to P.E.N. Clubs and a Letter

quote: God’s joy can fill our days with gladness until we receive the answer we are waiting for.
author: Suzanne Elizabeth Anderson, Waiting with God

quote: Don't judge your success by what people think of you. You are your own success.Your determination and perserverence is what matters.
author: Abigal Muchecheti, Married to a Devil

quote: Dream big and never give up on those dreams. Who knows where they'll take you?
author: Amy McGuire

quote: At times, it can feel like the loneliest place on Earth, because it’s just us. Alone with our unanswered prayers
author: Suzanne Elizabeth Anderson, Waiting with God

quote: Change is possible if you allow it to happen. Nothing in life is constant
author: it's always evolving and that's how life happens for me. Through my adversities I can reach new heights.

quote: Take the first step. No more, no less, and the next will be revealed.
author: Clement Watt

quote: Gather the best you have to offer and create a heartfelt, prosperous life full of purpose.
author: Gail McMeekin, The 12 Secrets of Highly Successful Women: A Portable Life Coach for Creative Women

quote: The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and let it come in.
author: Morrie Schwartz.

quote: I am the only force strong enough to stop me.
author: Naya S. Wood

quote: … e mult mai nobil sa ramai lucid oricat te-ar coplesi viata, esti totdeauna mai putin om cand te imbeti, indiferent cum, si daca fuga de realitate nu-i chiar o decadere, ramane totusi o infrangere.
author: Radu Tudoran, Un port la rasarit

quote: Whether you think you're right or you think you're wrong. You're right.""If you think in pictures, write. If you think in words, paint.
author: Krista Kedrick, Under a Prairie Moon

quote: Some instances in life call for humility. But, sometimes you need to be flat-out brazen when it comes to the desires of your heart.
author: Nakia R. Laushaul

quote: Living a Princely life requires that you learn to think and reason like the Prince, talk and behave like him, react like him as well.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: Try it before you doubt it, because it might just be for you
author: Rayvon L. Browne

quote: The calling of an author is more than just to entertain, but also to share ones experiences with the world.
author: M.J. Stoddard

quote: A persons limitations are only measured by their drive to succeed
author: Brian A. Leslie

quote: The task of modern man is not to find his inner self, but to create himself.
author: Rod Judkins, Change Your Mind: 57 Ways to Unlock Your Creative Self

quote: Live your life as a curious student and you will discover how fascinating it is.
author: Elena Ornig

quote: life is not about how fast you start,but how the end is going to be ,so don't worry when others are ahead of you.just keep on doing what you have been doing.
author: lexis smigz

quote: The wide awake man seizes opportunities or makes them, and thus those who are widest awake usually come to the front.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quote: Because I lay with him… I’ve caught a glimpse of heaven. Or I understand what I need. Or I have the courage to be myself.
author: K.Z. Snow, The Zero Knot

quote: Fear is a probability by its own cause of actions, if we live by it we lose all the possibilities of endurance
author: Saleem Durrani

quote: Length of a straight line is determined by the two tiny dots on both ends
author: mads

quote: I've learned that the universe doesn't care what our motives are, only our actions. So we should do things that will bring about good, even if there is an element of selfishness involved. Like the kids at my school might join the Key Club or Future Buisness Leaders of America, because it's a social thing and looks good on their record, not because they really want to volunteer at the nursing home. But the people at the nursing home still benefit from it, so it's better that the kids do it than not do it. And if they never did it, then they wouldn't find out that they actually liked it.
author: Wendy Mass, 13 Gifts

quote: I thought that my voyage had come to its end at the last limit of my power, that the path before me was closed, that provisions were exhausted, and the time come to take shelter in a silent obscurity, but I find that thy will knows no end in me, and when old words die out on the tongue, new melodies break forth from the heart, and where the old tracks are lost, new country is revealed with its wonders.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: But hell, you've gotta work with what you've got.
author: Haruki Murakami, 1Q84

quote: There is a higher form of hierarchy and that is the hierarchy of the spirit. When I stand in front of a person, I stand in front of a soul and I have met magnificent souls in bodies possessing no money, as well as parched and shallow souls in bodies bathed in riches. In the same light, I have met magnificent souls in bodies bathed in wealth, as well as parched and shallow souls in bodies that are impoverished. I am tired of people busying their minds with hierarchy based upon money, because this form of hierarchy is primitive; meanwhile there is an altogether higher form of hierarchy that is of the soul. As you judge man and woman based upon their riches, I laugh at your primitive form of judgment! When I stand in front of a human, I stand in front of a soul.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Maybe God doesn't care if we get all dressed up and sit in the pew every Sunday, as Diana believes. Instead, maybe God comes to us through men like Sloth, watching over us as we make our own decisions. Maybe God has always been with me. Opening doors, leading me to opportunities, letting me choose my own path, and loving me even when I chose the wrong one. Never giving up on me. Knowing all along that I am on a journey. That I must find my own way to Him. Maybe River was rights. Maybe God does still believe in me.
author: Julie Cantrell, Into the Free

quote: My friends, don't idolize hardship. What you idolize is what your heart will look for and what your heart looks for is what you will have. And don't capitalize on misfortune, because you will always seek out to have capital! Throw away that pride! Don't put sorrow on a pedestal! If you ask me if I would rather have had my sorrows or not, I will tell you that no, I would rather have not had any of them! In the blink of an eye, I would rid myself of them! I have no pride. I don't rely on hardships and sorrows to mold me into someone. I don't allow myself to be dictated. When hardship and sorrow come knocking, saying "We are responsible for who you are today, let us in!" I'm going to say, in a split second, "No you're not! Go away, I don't owe you anything!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: There are blue diamonds born to the world and given to those who only want glass crystals. There are blue roses born to the world yet given to those who only want daisies. Blue diamond, don't cry because they want glass crystals. Blue rose, don't bleed because they see only the daisies. You were formed in the bedroom of the gods, you were conceived in the garden of the eternal!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Le souvenir n'est qu'un regard posé de temps en temps sur des êtres devenus intérieurs,mais qui ne dépendent pas de la mémoire pour continuer d'exister.
author: Marguerite Yourcenar, L'Œuvre au noir

quote: We all have something redeemable in us, no matter how small." - Laura Armstrong, A Human Element
author: Donna Galanti, A Human Element

quote: Anybody can make the simple complecated. Creativity is making the complecated simple.
author: Charles Mingus, Charles Mingus - More Than a Fake Book

quote: If all the people who were called "crazy" started acting "normal", we'd probably still be living in caves.
author: Joana James

quote: For every woman, there is that one man who could get her to go anywhere he wanted her to go, do anything he wanted her to do—reach into her soul and turn her whole world on its ear—challenge everything she thought she believed. Highlighted by 24 Kindle users
author: Lenore Wolfe

quote: ...You mistake other people’s success as your own failure...
author: Stephan Lawrence Theodore Clifford, Qualia

quote: ...Make God's Word your Sourcebook...
author: David Jeremiah, Until Christ Returns: Living Faithfully Today While We Wait for Our Glorious Tomorrow

quote: If you are willing to go out on a limb, the tree of life holds endless possibilities.
author: Angel Sharum

quote: You can't test courage cautiously.” (Annie Dillard)
author: Marcia Quinn Noren, Joan of Arc: The Mystic Legacy

quote: make the most of the day, by determining to spend it on two sorts of acquaintances only - those by whom something may be got, and those from whom something may be learned. - Colton
author: Colton Robinsmith

quote: Friends who love us know that motherhood is about transitioning--and adjusting, constantly, to those changes. We must become masters of change because that is what life demands of us.
author: Meg Meeker, The 10 Habits of Happy Mothers: Reclaiming Our Passion, Purpose, and Sanity

quote: I led the life of so many other so-called respectable people,—that is, in debauchery. And like the majority, while leading the life of a debauche, I was convinced that I was a man of irreproachable morality.
author: Leo Tolstoy, Kreutzer Sonata and Family Happiness

quote: A drop of water shall be returned with a burst of spring.
author: Pat Cher

quote: Love and honor the world around you, and you experience life in its fullest. There is no “Other.” There is simply us. The all of us, the whole of us. The mankind of us. Anything else is a lie.
author: Cassandra Blizzard

quote: fight for what you believe in,for if you don't you will be forever fighting against yourself.
author: Keisha Keenleyside

quote: Your life is a reflection of your thoughts. Think well.
author: Danielle Pierre

quote: Librarians are tour-guides for all of knowledge.
author: Patrick Ness

quote: Those that yield are not always weak
author: Jacqueline Carey

quote: a hero is just somebody who does the right thing when it would be far, far easier to do nothing.”-Cedric Diggory-
author: G. Norman Lippert, James Potter and the Hall of Elders' Crossing

quote: I is for Integrity, be honest with yourself and others.
author: Lucas Remmerswaal, The A-Z of 13 Habits: Inspired by Warren Buffett

quote: S is for SCARY! Fear is driven out by action! Bad habits are overcome by good habits.
author: Lucas Remmerswaal, The A-Z of 13 Habits: Inspired by Warren Buffett

quote: Warren Buffett chuckled and said to me "I hope it's not my bad habits" Good Habits once established are just as hard to break as bad habits and bad habits are easier to abandon today than tomorrow. So what are you going to do about it?
author: Lucas Remmerswaal, 13 Habits.com the Tale of Tortoise Buffett and Trader Hare

quote: In a few more days I'd anticipated telling Veronika that our injections had cured her heart condition. But in light of her unscheduled departure form Villette my telling that particular lie will not be required. The majority of people who attempt suicide repeat that attempt until they succeed. I took a risk in lying to her about her condition, i decided to test the only remedy i have come to have any faith in: awareness of life. Until she finds out from some other doctor that she is perfectly healthy. She'll consider each day a miracle. Which in my view it is.
author: Paulo Coelho, Veronika Decides to Die

quote: Think outside the square. Think for yourself don't just follow the herd. Think multidisciplinary! Problems by definition, cross many academic disciplines.
author: Lucas Remmerswaal, The A-Z of 13 Habits: Inspired by Warren Buffett

quote: I can manage," said Frodo. "I must.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Return of the King

quote: When we stop fighting against death, we are able to wake up to our lives.
author: Daniel Gottlieb, Letters to Sam: A Grandfather's Lessons on Love, Loss, and the Gifts of Life

quote: More than once, the broken moon would cast through the window a silver light and remind me of independent events yielding to their own momentum and interacting under natural laws while my mind would impose happiness, grief, beauty, ruin, justice and chaos.
author: Leonard Seet

quote: It is the road you take that decides your destiny and not your destiny that decides the road you take.
author: Apoorve Dubey, The Flight Of Ambition

quote: love yourself,.,.,.,for the sake of  your better future
author: John Grisham, La tapadera

quote: Cut not the wings of your dreams, for they are the heartbeat and the freedom of your soul.
author: Flavia

quote: Z is for Zany! Master the Zany habit of thinking backwards. it will help you become a really great thinker!
author: Lucas Remmerswaal, The A-Z of 13 Habits: Inspired by Warren Buffett

quote: Don't tawch meh matherfawker!
author: Tommy Wiseau

quote: During the crash and burn, I began to burn from cranial crown to flat sole, for meaning and understanding. Every concept, psychological perceptions with hardened pathways, everything that registered as inherited from the communal was starting to dissolve into meaninglessness. The foundational tenets, the pre-established belief systems, instilled sustenance systems tended by both family and extended communal began to dissolve, first as trivial, and then as untenable to my being without validation from me. If my life was worth anything, I choose to live the best life for me. So I entered what I call The Blank State.
author: Dew Platt, Failure&solitude

quote: X is for X-mas Concentrate your energies, your thoughts and your capital. Put all your eggs in one basket and then watch that basket, then all your Christmases can come at once!
author: Lucas Remmerswaal, The A-Z of 13 Habits: Inspired by Warren Buffett

quote: There is no rest in the heart of God until He knows that you are at resh in His grace.
author: Lloyd John Ogilvie, Perfect Peace

quote: The day of perfection is not scheduled on earth.
author: Naty Matos

quote: The importance of knowing for certain that you have been saved cannot be understated. We do not know how many days, hours, or minutes God has granted us here to have an opportunity to make a choice.
author: Kimberly McRae, Living by Faith: Beginning Your Walk as a New Believer

quote: To prepare for the mountains develop mind, body, will and spirit as strong as a sword, soft as a pillow and fluid as water.
author: Jeffrey Rasley

quote: Feeling guilty does not set us free. Being equipped sets us free.
author: Thom Hunter

quote: word is like a sword; you should be wise when to use it or it'll kill and ruin everything you did in your past, you're doing at this time, and you're gonna do in the future
author: A. Vaidyanathan

quote: Live well, Laugh often, Love much.
author: Bessie Anderson Stanley

quote: Time changes all things
author: there is no reason why language should escape this universal law

quote: Transient guests are we.
author: Hideyuki Kikuchi

quote: For every dilemma, find at least three or four possible solutions. The creative process leads to better results.
author: Marilyn Suttle, Who's Your Gladys?: How to Turn Even the Most Difficult Customer Into Your Biggest Fan

quote: Above everything else, genuinely love yourself first. Self-love is powerful and it’s the best love that you will ever have. When you love who YOU are, your relationships will be healthier and your life will be happier. Self-love sets the standard in how we allow others to treat us and how we treat ourselves. Your happiness and well-being is important. Protect it by always valuing who you are!
author: Stephanie Lahart

quote: Life is agid, life is fulgid. Life is what the least of us make most of us feel the least of us make the most of. Life is a burgeoning, a quickening of the dim primordial urge in the murky wastes of time.
author: Willard Van Orman Quine

quote: When you make the dream of your heart a treasure of heaven, it holds an eternal value.
author: Deborah Brodie, The Path That Gets Brighter: A Devotional to Instruct, Illustrate, and Encourage Kingdom Principles

quote: Feed your self-esteem
author: not your ego!

quote: Genius is the power of lighting one's own fire!
author: John Forster

quote: ...the best Evil Plan offers something much more for people--a chance to buy into an idea that matters, and share it with people who matter to them.
author: Hugh MacLeod, Evil Plans: Having Fun on the Road to World Domination

quote: Dreams are what keep us growing. They are what keep us alive. To give up, is to let our dreams die.
author: Phil Mitchell, A Bright New Morning: An American Story

quote: It only takes one minute to find a really good book, but it can give you a lifetime of memories when you read a really good book that leaves you with lasting impression.
author: Nahisha McCoy

quote: The moon stared at me through sprinkled nighttime stardust and I alone smile.
author: Jay     Long

quote: Your rebel soul shines like a diamond pulled from dust: bright, clear and flawless.
author: Jay     Long

quote: Every act of goodness is born from our desire to be happy.
author: Udai Yadla

quote: Not all things that fall down break. Some develop wings.
author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

quote: A diamond earns its sparkle from the pressure it endures.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: SHINE JESUS - I have found, the more we point others to Jesus... the more His radiance shines through us. "Those who are wise will shine like the brightest of heavens, and those who turn many to righteousness will shine like stars forever and ever." Daniel 12:3
author: Paul Cobb

quote: Moments caught in time. Simple memories spread out before me. Timeless reminders of how life goes on, even when it feels as if you cannot.
author: Jay     Long

quote: I pray, before I die, that I receive the power to believe in fairytales again, Oh' how I would love to laugh and know that God laughed with me.
author: Tonny K. Brown

quote: If you're jealous of someone else it simply means you have not come to a true acceptance and appreciation of yourself.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: We put great expectations on our tomorrows when we truly need to rely on ourselves. Far too many overlook personal action, as a means to get things done. Blame is easily passed if one does not hold themselves accountable.
author: Jay     Long

quote: Hopes, wants and wishes, all cast across the night sky with my heart in tow.
author: Jay     Long

quote: Start small and keep going.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Turn obstacles into opportunities and problems into possibilities.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: Every day send some blessings to the world. Let there be flow of love
author: Amit Ray, Walking the Path of Compassion

quote: Always be open to inspiration. You never know where it may come from. Begin with an open mind, end with an inspired heart.
author: Sheri   Fink

quote: The essence of life does not consist in the lushness of your possessions, but in the richness of your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Those who win never give up.Those who give up never win.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Be thankful for the efforts of people who worked hard to get you where you are
author: you should not take it for granted and treat them with indifference.

quote: Those who win never quit
author: those who quit never win.

quote: Patience, more than the ability to bear pains or endure waiting, is to be calm no matter what happens – constantly take action to turn it to positive growth opportunities – and have faith to believe that it will all work out in the end while you are waiting.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Comfort zone: simply means the routine of one’s daily life – it is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Everyday gratitude sweetens what appears flavorless and brightens all that appears dim.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Be the person that will take the first step towards personal success. You will be remembered for it.
author: Steven Cuoco

quote: Do not be complacent about your achievements and not to strive for continual improvement when you get to the top. As soon as you let success go to your head, you sink into following familiar patterns and play it safe. In other words, you risk losing your edge.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Only number 1 is unique, rest is just numbers,fight to be no.1
author: Mohammed Sekouty

quote: Learning to focus on the big picture will help you keep things in a proper perspective.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Making time to experience joy is the single most important thing you can do to heal your heart.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Be the positive impact on someone’s life.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: When you give your mind, body, and heart the message that you are worth the effort of being conscious, miraculous things start to happen.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Grateful people are happy people. The more things you are grateful for, the happier you will be.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Interconnection permeates the entire universe. We are all one.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: What are five things you are grateful for? Right now? Open to gratitude and you will soften into joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Loving yourself is required for authentic relationships.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: An ocean of shimmering love exists in your heart. Tap into it today and rest in the undulating currents of the great mystery.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Yes I have done it all. Tested the shallow waters, swam through the dangerous tides, met strangers, seen friends turn strangers, taken risks to achieve my goals, persevered to out do myself each time, rose high, fell hard, learned to climb, learned to dream and in dreaming learned to relate to reality. I have earned respect, achieved things very young, believed in my potential, questioned it too but through it all I have never stopped to aspire. I am a human and I must adapt to the changing seasons, learn new skills and master them all. Now as I stand and look up, I see a heap of laurels yet to achieve and chest of mysteries yet to resolve. I am not one in the crowd. I'll forever be the one whom they could never be
author: Adhish Mazumder

quote: Creativity flows when the mind is light. Be light and ignite your imagination.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: We are entirely made up of dreams yearning to be lived. At every point in time, DO what you can, when you can and however you can to invest your time and efforts in your dreams; directly and without evasion.
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

quote: Be your own limited edition.
author: Steven Cuoco

quote: Success is the relentless pursuit of joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: There is nothing so convincing as a thing well done.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Hope is holding on to the promises of God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, The Wings of Hope: Survivor
