quote: The way I see it, our natural human instinct is to fight or flee that which we perceive to be dangerous. Although this mechanism evolved to protect us, it serves as the single greatest limiting process to our growth. To put this process in perspective and not let it rule my life, Iexpect the unexpected;make the unfamiliar familiar;make the unknown known;make the uncomfortable comfortable;believe the unbelievable.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Wishes are possibilities. Dare to make a wish.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I have always believed in the power of collaboration. Early on in my professional career, I realized that you can't develop all the competencies you need fast enough on your own. Furthermore, if you don't collaborate, your ideas will be limited to your own abilities. As a result, you will not be able to serve your clientele and thus can't achieve the anticipated impact.
author: Vishwas Chavan, Vishwasutras: Universal Principles for Living: Inspired by Real-Life Experiences

quote: By recalling God’s past provision, we can reassure ourselves that what He has done in the past, He will do again in the future.
author: Suzanne Elizabeth Anderson, Waiting with God

quote: Why settle for a lesser vision? When you are destiny for greatness!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: It is during our failures that we discover our true desire for success.
author: Kevin Ngo, Let's Do This! 100 Powerful Messages to Help You Take Action

quote: Deal with your past so that it won't affect your future.
author: The Prolific Penman

quote: The creative mind seeks chance and accident while everyone else seeks control and order. Rod Judkins ‘Change Your Mind
author: Rod Judkins, Change Your Mind: 57 Ways to Unlock Your Creative Self

quote: Follow your heart. Then root its longing with the facts.
author: Gina Greenlee, Postcards and Pearls: Life Lessons from Solo Moments on the Road

quote: Don't worry about the negative people may say about you. Learn from it and move on.
author: Amanda Penland

quote: If we will turn to God in prayer, and if we will seek His comfort through His Words in the Bible, we will find our hearts and minds healed.
author: Suzanne Elizabeth Anderson, Waiting with God

quote: Listen within to find shining poetry and hear extraordinary music. You are a work of art.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: If you want to change the world,learn to change yourself first.
author: Hazrat Ali ibn Abu-Talib R.A

quote: Thanksgiving is a joyous invitation to shower the world with love and gratitude.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Earn Nicely, spend wisely and you will live happily.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Peace begins when expectations end.
author: Sri Chinmoy

quote: You know what's just as powerful as a good cup of coffee in the morning? Starting your day with some good, loving thoughts. It can change how your whole day unfolds.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: Fiction reveals truths that reality obscures.
author: Jessamyne West

quote: Life gave me lemons, then I met you and you had Vodka. Now my life is a party.
author: anmol gandhi

quote: The Poetry of LoveWe see the world with the eyes of a small child.We visualize the beauty of the world with an unique magic sense,and unfold our deeper feelings and expectations diffusing the seizing negative forces that stretch out their threatening tentacles.We give blow and shape in our dreams.We seek for Love through unfamiliar new people and new experiences. Love is a vivid spirit, a big breath that touches upon each piece of our existence, our each cell…Love affiliates a lot of forms, exists and fits everywhere.Each flight of a small bird, the flutter of an incredible beauty butterfly, the stones wetted by waters of Aquamarine River, the branches of the trees that dally with the blow of wind, all these is the Spirit of Love.When you love in a genuine way, love everything.You are not bothered by the babble of Nature and the strange reactions of people.You hear the sounds of everyday routine with bigger consequence. Overtakes the meanness consequently and with courage.You seek truth in small things.You live the each moment as if it's unique.Love for nature.Love for life.Love for people.
author: Katerina Kostaki, Cosmic Light

quote: Enjoy every day and make each day great
author: Ron Law

quote: Do not wait for life. Do not long for it. Be aware, always and at every moment, that the miracle is in the here and now.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Do not do what you cannot continue to deliver.For, remember, the world wants to see a continuity of delivery of set standards...!
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: When you want something, he entire universe conspires to help you achieve it.
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: Time is too short in this one life, to be able to do everything, but it definitely is long enough at least to be able to develop the will to do anything & everything...
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: The challenge of life is regretless decision making, relentless pursuit of vision with faith, forgiving others, enduring pain with a smile & achieving goals with an extra MILE
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: Nothing Comes Home...You Have To Get OUT & Get IT~!
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: A sense of the divine presence and indwelling bears the soul towards heaven as upon the wings of eagles.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quote: Once You keep Aside the Emotional side Of yours,Is when You stop using the phrase “This was a BAD PHASE” of life..
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: Patience Pays..Is true! But the greater truth is that it takes advance payment before it pays you in return!
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: A focused Mind is a result Of a little Effort To tell Your Distractions To sleep for A couple of hours While you are at WORK.
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: Every comforting word is a command from a man of action...While every word of command is commotion from a man of just words...
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: All have dreams, live for them, They add meaning to LIFE.The only thing that differentiates us from other beings is the fact that us can DREAM!!!
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: The two toughest lessons to learn In life are “LET GO” & “LETs GO..!
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: Have a GOAL to keep the following 5-‘H’ OUT of your lifeH – HarassH – HamperH – HurtH – HarmH – HinderTo Ensure H=Happiness Prevails forever!
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: Let All Your Life’s Experiences Lead To More Writing & Encourage More Reading..!
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: The Glory Is Always Hidden Between The Lines Of the Story
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: IT’s All In The Game Of Mind.
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: A whetstone, though it cannot cut, may sharpen a knife that will.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quote: I promise.For the other side of the card, I put the giraffe and penguin on it and wrote:To think and try not to over think.To breathe, but not hyperventilate.To try to envision the best, and not dwell on the worst.To call you when I'm in trouble.To not do anything permanent on a situation that might be temporary.
author: Shirley Miranda, Falling

quote: life is worth living when you have someone to share it with ..
author: zybil rogan

quote: A Controlled Mind Can Create All That It Words...!
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: Ninety percent of everything you believe you can achieve in life you will.
author: Gregory C. Dugger

quote: Never worry a bit in Life. Always be full of merriment.
author: sharda sriram

quote: A man is only as rich as the people around him
author: Brian A. Leslie

quote: True success cannot be achieved until you have experienced failure
author: Brian A. Leslie

quote: Having the best doesn't make you the best but producing the best makes you the best
author: ejembi louis

quote: Above all, never think you're not good enough. Never think that. In life people will take you at your own reckoning.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: I NAME THIS LAND TOMORROW, FOR IT SHALL LAST FOREVERMORE!
author: Cressida Cowell, How to Break a Dragon's Heart

quote: I love words.  I crave descriptions that overwhelm my imagination with vivid detail.  I dwell on phrases that make my heart thrum.  I cherish expressions that pierce my emotions and force the tears to spill over.   In essence, I long for a writer's soul sealed in ink on the page.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: But just remember: a woman's like a rose; if you treat her right, she'll bloom, if you don't, she'll wilt.
author: Eric Wilson, Fireproof

quote: When dreams become words to share with others - amazing things can happen.
author: Richard A. Hackett Jr.

quote: Friends, Romans, countrymen, lend me your ears; I come to bury Caesar, not to praise him; The evil that men do lives after them, The good is oft interred with their bones
author: William Shakespeare, Julius Caesar

quote: You never leave your partner! Especially in a fire!
author: Jennifer Dion

quote: The choices one makes, not one's blood, determine one's destiny - John Steinbeck
author: Laxmi Hariharan

quote: The best way to solve a problem is to prevent it.
author: chibisa charles

quote: The world should have been in Technicolour, but seemed more like black and white.
author: Kenneth Oppel, Half Brother

quote: Do not presume that richness or poorness will bring you happiness.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: But men and women are different in the way that they feel loved. Men like to be admired for what they do, for their integrity and their accomplishments, whether it’s at work or at the gym or mowing the lawn, because it makes them feel manly. When a woman tells a man that she is proud of him, or she tells him that he did a good job, he’ll about bend over backwards to take care of her and love her.”  “But women like attention from men, because it makes them feel feminine and adored. That’s why they’re always fixin’ themselves up, doing their hair, wearing pretty clothes and makeup and jewelry and perfume. It’s all to attract your attention, you know.” (Thelma Jenkins)
author: Carol  McCormick

quote: If you're lost and aloneOr you're sinking like a stoneCarry on...May your past be the soundOf your feet upon the groundCarry on
author: Fun

quote: Always set small, realistic goals that you know you can achieve first. But don't give up on the bigger ones that may seem too far from your reach.
author: W.D. Lady

quote: Too many people are missing their destiny a year at a time because they're too scared to think in decades!" (p. 127)
author: Pete Greig, Punk Monk: New Monasticism and the Ancient Art of Breathing

quote: Love cannot be hidden. It even shines in the darkest places." ~ Carla Olson Gade, The Shadow Catcher's Daughter
author: Carla Olson Gade

quote: Life is short,Live it long
author: Zaveric

quote: Here, in this quiet place we own, worlds are born.
author: Cassandra Wilson Run the Voodoo Down

quote: One who has reached a goal no longer travels the road"(Pauline Christianity, p. 111)
author: John Ziesler

quote: The Prince is the only option to a better living. His arm is reliable and dependable. Get to Him, stay glued and remain on Top!
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: You're never losing when you're learning !
author: Knowledge Notes

quote: Nervousness kill us... because we think we have only one opportunity that is in the Present and we don't think about the future! We loose our balance.
author: Vikram Roy

quote: I can do nothing without His help. Oh, Lord, what ignorance thinking everything was wealth.
author: Venus Angelica Perez

quote: I am reminded that the children we birth do not belong to us. They belong to God. We are simply the vessel through which they arrive on this earth. We are appointed to care for and guide them; however, we must recognize when the time comes for them to govern their own lives.
author: Nancy B. Brewer

quote: Men brave and generous live the best lives, seldom will they sorrow; then there are fools, afraid of everything, who grumble instead of giving.
author: Anonymous, The Poetic Edda

quote: Because...” he used to cradle his daughter in his arms every morning and often they would exchange soft nuances “...if you can dream it, if you can see it in your visions at night, if you can feel it in your soul, it’s yours! And it never really belonged to anyone else, in the first place! It was always yours!” Viera returned her scroll to the drawer and closed it, she kissed the compass around her neck and climbed into her bed under the warm quilts, the candle flame crackled and the memories of her father’s arms around her embraced her there in bed and his deep, hoarse voice resounded in her ears; “... and if you chance upon a treasure that is yours and it happens to be in the possession of someone else, it’s not very wrong to take what is yours, to take what you dreamed, what you saw in your visions at night, what you felt visit you in your spirit! Sure, it’s not lawful, but aye aye my little one, listen to me when I tell you that the best things in life are not under the laws of any sort! For which law created love? Which law created courage? The best things, the real things, are the things that are not measured by any man’s laws! Fear is the only thing that any law has ever created! And what kind of pirates would we all be if we were afraid of any of our fears, even a little!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: What you believe you can receive if you doubt it you will do without it.
author: JoCecelia Shinn

quote: We are the ones we've been waiting for.
author: Colin Beavan, No Impact Man: The Adventures of a Guilty Liberal Who Attempts to Save the Planet and the Discoveries He Makes About Himself and Our Way of Life in the Process

quote: Courage is living by the free will that one creates for themselves, not the life of monotony determined by another.
author: Michelle Cruz-Rosado

quote: Last night at Bingo, Sylvia won the last prize. 'What am I going to do with a mermaid?" "Learn to swim in the murkiest water, reinvent yourself," the mermaid said #149
author: Monique Duval, The Persistence of Yellow: A Book of Recipes for Life

quote: Ah, yes, choice. I chose to let my ghosts stay in past. Past is history you know. Living is now. I sat. I breathed. I let past go. I let future go. I am. That is all.
author: Natalie Wright, Emily's House

quote: The tricky part about discovering our giftedness is that it may be in an area that feels unexpected.
author: Meg Meeker, The 10 Habits of Happy Mothers: Reclaiming Our Passion, Purpose, and Sanity

quote: When you are like the tree, there is oneness with the Earth, Sun and Moon, but still steadfast in your purpose.
author: Michelle Cruz-Rosado

quote: she was lucky if he stood behind her. Not so lucky if he came to crush her. And a woman might only learn the truth of it—when he walked out of her life. Highlighted by 9 Kindle users
author: Lenore Wolfe, Dark Warrior: To Tame a Wild Hawk

quote: No one in this world can change your habits, but only you can..... so, MOst powerfull person of this world is you..!..........keep that in your mind!
author: M Fazan Hafeez

quote: Do not blame your parents for not working hard enough to birth you with silver spoon in your mouth because tomorrow you will be a parent and your children will in turn blame you for not giving birth to them with the desired silver spoon.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: A champion is someone ho gets up, een when he can't
author: Jack  Dempsey, How to Fight Tough

quote: Time bows to authentic commitment, and it stretches to accommodate it.
author: Will Hewett

quote: Your world of poverty can be recreated to that of affluence simply by speaking the Prince's language.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: After Every Storm There Is A Rainbow
author: April Lovett-Bradford

quote: the holiest place on earth is where an ancient hatred has become apresent love.
author: Helen Shucman

quote: Dining with the King; your attire, attitude and mentality must change.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, Risk It, Be Different

quote: you are you when you are true
author: Yasmine Butts

quote: Not doing harder than doing.
author: Natalie Wright, Emily's House

quote: Each of us has a vulnerability like Edmund's that Satan is eager to exploit. It may be something addictive like drugs or alcohol, or it may be something seemingly harmless and perhaps even good like food, friendship, or work.
author: Discovery House Publishers

quote: Denying yourself a life of personal freedom is denying yourself of a life worth living.
author: Michelle Cruz-Rosado

quote: This is a time when all of God's people need to keep their eyes and their Bibles wide open. We must ask God for discernment as never before.
author: David Jeremiah, Until Christ Returns: Living Faithfully Today While We Wait for Our Glorious Tomorrow

quote: I am going to open myself up to all that is superior in the world and beyond and I am going to spend time trying to take delight in things! Not finding ruin in them! If the ruin of you is what you look for, the ruin of you is what you are going to find!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: What if man is not really a scoundrel, man in general, I mean, the whole race of mankind-then all the rest is prejudice, simply artificial terrors and there are no barriers and it's all as it should be.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, Crime and Punishment

quote: The tide was a poem that only time could create, and I watched it stream and brim and makes its steady dash homeward, to the ocean.
author: Pat Conroy, South of Broad

quote: When all is said and done all anyone has left is their integrity at their core... Don't give that away too.
author: Solange nicole

quote: Just remember, the difference between being good versus being great is just a few points, inches, or seconds.
author: Bruce H. Jackson

quote: When you don't know what the answer is, you know *Who* the answer is.
author: Larry Burkett

quote: Let yourself be enchanted in small ways.
author: Guy Kawasaki, Enchantment: The Art of Changing Hearts, Minds, and Actions

quote: If you have put your faith in Christ and have spent significant time in the Word of God, the tough times can be like a magnet that draws you to the Lord Jesus. Nothing is going to happen - ever - that will catch Jesus Christ by surprise. He is able to help His children work through anything, and not a single thing is going to happen in the future that can change that fact.
author: David Jeremiah

quote: My study of prophecy convinces me that God intends knowledge of future events to help us "occupy" with a sense of urgency until the Lord returns.
author: David Jeremiah, Until Christ Returns: Living Faithfully Today While We Wait for Our Glorious Tomorrow

quote: Be the Light you seek so desperately in your life and chase away that darkness.
author: Solange nicole

quote: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You have to set yourself on fire.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Go where your nose leads you
author: Patricia Griecci, Pampered Pooch Parties: Easy Dog Recipes And Crafts To Create A Howling Good Time

quote: Do you know why I believe in the Lord Jesus and what He says? Because He has proved to me that He has my best interests at heart. What could He do that He did not do? He already gave His life for us (Romans 5:8-10
What He said He would do He always did, and the things we already see fulfilled in His Word simply remind us that what He said about the future will take place just as surely.
author: David Jeremiah, Until Christ Returns: Living Faithfully Today While We Wait for Our Glorious Tomorrow

quote: If you buy an egg thinking it's a goose's egg, and when it hatches it is actually a bird of paradise; no manner of convincing and reproach will turn the bird of paradise into a goose. Even if you make it go to goose church and goose school and eat goose feeds and only hang out with geese! In the end, it will still belong to paradise.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: We can remove the veil that shrouds our understanding and made us forget who we truly are. When we understand the core self and live from the core self, the myth of separation, concepts of separation, color, religion, class, intelligence…all these fade away. We are not our color. We are not our religion. We are not our sexual preference. We are human beings. We are spiritual beings.
author: Cassandra Blizzard, A World Without Color

quote: I used to fear things like not having enough alcohol and drugs, or the money to get them. Now I fear someone holding me down and physically forcing me to take drugs and drink alcohol. I fear that for some reason I wouldn't be allowed or wouldn't be able to read anymore.
author: Phil Volatile

quote: If you have put your faith in Christ and have spent significant time in the Word of God, the tough times can be like a magnet that draws you to the Lord Jesus.
author: David Jeremiah, Until Christ Returns: Living Faithfully Today While We Wait for Our Glorious Tomorrow

quote: Only something extremely dire and disabling will ever stop a real writer from writing. Retirement is never an option.
author: Warren Adler

quote: [Jesus] not only kept Himself from engaging in evil, He also continually acted in ways that honored and glorified god. He not only continually avoided the negative, He always pursued the positive.
author: David Jeremiah, Until Christ Returns: Living Faithfully Today While We Wait for Our Glorious Tomorrow

quote: decision is of the mind not of the mouth also determination is of the heart not of the head- Golden Life Foundation
author: Chris C. Nwakanma

quote: [Christ] will come again. But we must look to Scripture, not human thought, for our guide to preparing.
author: David Jeremiah, Until Christ Returns: Living Faithfully Today While We Wait for Our Glorious Tomorrow

quote: Amid the thousands of shrill voices screaming for our attention, there is but on Voice we need to hear. The voice of the Lord Jesus Christ.
author: David Jeremiah, Until Christ Returns: Living Faithfully Today While We Wait for Our Glorious Tomorrow

quote: All one can really leave one's children is what's inside their heads. Education, in other words, and not earthly possessions, is the ultimate legacy, the only thing that cannot be taken away.
author: Wernher von Braun

quote: We're never called on to do what hurts. We just do what hurts out of ignorance and habit. Once we see what we're doing, we can stop.
author: Steve Hagen, Buddhism Plain and Simple

quote: Remember that a wish held fervently turns into belief, and a belief held diligently becomes reality.
author: Jim Stovall, The Lamp

quote: He won't listen to the music, and I can't turn it off.
author: V.C. Andrews

quote: The Buddha encouraged people to "know for yourselves that certain things are unwholesome and wrong. And when you do, then give them up. And when you know for yourselves that certain things are wholesome and good, then accept them and follow them."The message is always to examine and see for yourself. When you see for yourself what is true-and that's really the only way that you can genuinely know anything-then embrace it. Until then, just suspend judgment and criticism.
author: Steve Hagen, Buddhism Plain and Simple

quote: In-existence, the soul’s greatest imposition is its perfection. It is projected as a perfected form of the physical embodiment, an emblem of things, perhaps hyperreal and untouchably perfect as existence. It can not be! The soul in-existence is nothing of perfection. It is raw potential. The soul is nothing but potential. To be specific, the soul is unordered potential!
author: Dew Platt, The Rudeness of Soul

quote: We've all received our share of good fortune, so that's my definition of much. A single blessing is all the bounty in the world, and if you've been blessed at all you're meant to pass some of that on. You're meant to set a positive example. That's our responsibility" (20) - Denzel Washington, "So that We Might Follow
author: Denzel Washington, A Hand to Guide Me

quote: A dream is an idea involving a sense of possibilities rather than probabilities, of potential rather than limits. A dream is the wellspring of passion, giving us direction and pointing us to lofty heights. It is an expression of optimism, hope and values lofty enough to capture the imagination and engage the spirit. Dreams grab us and move us. They are capable of lifting us to new heights and overcoming self-imposed limitations.
author: Robert Kriegel

quote: Worth as I use it here is immeasurable, not as in mathematics towards infinity. But that it can not be measured. There are no measurable parameters for it! Certainly not a material-communal measurable parameter for it! Such, it is what the being holds that cannot and should never be traded. When it is there, every essence of your being knows it, and takes commands from it that will be able to override any personal or imposed sense of value.
author: Dew Platt, Failure&solitude

quote: Jesus knew that many of his listeners believed the old wineskin (or way of doing things) was good enough. They were comfortable with their beliefs and practices, but Jesus hadn't come to patch up old religious traditions. He was offering a new garment, a new wineskin, a way of life that didn't abolish the old ways, but fulfilled them.The teaching illuminated my own need to remain pliable before God. I realize that I must have a softer housing for my growing faith, one that can flex and change as God is at work inside of me. All too often I find myself clinging to that which is comfortable and familiar, rather than embracing the challenges that emerge with change and growth. Sometimes I shy away from people who have strong views that differ from mine, even though sharing a great conversation... could temper both our viewpoints and deepen our relationship. Why do I run away from strong opinions and potential conflict? Am I too comfortable and unwilling to change? Such a realization highlights the need for the Spirit in my life not just to discern and distinguish, but also to illuminate and invite me to move forward into the fullness of life with him." -Scouting the Divine
author: Margaret Feinberg, Scouting the Divine: My Search for God in Wine, Wool, and Wild Honey

quote: The Yorubas have a saying, here, my translation in English--a poor fool is a bigger fool rich. In other words, money only allows and enables you to be more of who you are. My bigger translation? You don't jump essence, you jump environs!
author: Dew Platt

quote: Freedom is in the Now
author: Arnaud Saint-Paul, The Human Project

quote: The day we put an end to believing in hope will be the day we stop existing, for without hope, we are nothing.
author: Kale Lawrence, The Clairvoyance Clock

quote: God can turn the impossibile into possibilities. Possibilities become opportunities. Opportunities leads us one step closer to our dreams!

quote: Me, well, there is meaning to the work and things I've done. But I never started an exercise revolution. I never became controversial because of my political beliefs. I don't believe I've affected change on a grand scale. I think I made a contribution. I know I've made people laugh. Through characters I have played, I've certainly allowed people to access their own expression of sadness or remorse, anger or disappointment. I've always believed that being an actor is a great service job. And I am of service. But it's just a job. So much of the glitz and fame, I can't even remember. I have blank spots where spotlights have been. It's easier for me to remember the ordinary goings-on of my life, because that's what my life is most of the time. It's just a life. Mine, like yours, has moaned and groaned. Stretched and turned. Sometimes good, oftentimes bad. People up and gone, love found and thrown away. Many moments make up a life. I am surprised by how many of my fame moments are blank spots. The volume turned down. Fame wants to turn up the volume on everything. It wears me out and intrudes on my need for solitude.

quote: Be appreciative about others, don’t criticize or crib about them. Gossiping will only fill you with negativity. Speak well about others. Positivity begets positivity. Don’t be in a hurry to pass judgment or criticize, check yourself before you do. It’ll pass- once you make a deliberate effort to be positive. If you can’t speak well of others then you have no right to speak ill either. A critical attitude spoils everything. You aren’t happy; in turn you don’t give your best, resultantly you get ticked off. Because you get ticked off you crib and criticize little realizing that you started this vicious circle in the first place. What, then, is the solution? It’s simple. Learn to see the good in everything and, more importantly, ignore the bad. Don’t go to the garden to see only those patches where there’s no grass, the beds where the flowers have not been able to bloom or the places where there are overgrown hedges. Instead go to relax, see the flowers in full bloom. Be thankful that you have sight to see things- you are not blind. Don’t criticize the elevator that broke down this morning- be thankful that you are strong enough to climb stairs. Don’t find fault with your boss and your job- be grateful that you have a job. Don’t look at the world through a tainted window- clean it first and you will realize that it’s bright and sunny outside.
author: Latika Teotia

quote: Be the light that inspires others to dream.

quote: Do not resist the flow of your life because it's your destiny.

quote: When you get more middle fingers than thumbs up, it's a progress.

quote: The Himalaya (hɪmalɶyɶ) does not make Rishis, the Rishis make the Himalaya (hɪmalɶyɶ) to be what it is. A Rishi is a beacon of light that expands and clarifies the stretches of vision of all those that connect with her/him here and now. It is like taking a candle into a dark room, and everything in the room is visible. As a natural and spontaneous consequence, the door leading to the open light filled outdoors becomes visible to you. You can now naturally and spontaneously step out of the room that you were trapped in due to the darkness of ignorance, and let your consciousness expand into infinity. Stay in the present moment, in the here and now, my brother. Immerse yourself into the present entirely. Then you will see these Rishis in yourSelf, here and now, and always. The infinitely spaced vast reaches of the picturesque multiple dimensions of the present moment, pregnant with all futures, right here right now, becomes your vision.”Krishna, ‘A Iyer in Jose’s Well
author: Sheshadharananda, Toward Avinasha

quote: If you want to change your life for the better, simple, just choose health for yourself and others, every step, every mode, and every turn; in your psyche, emotions, mental focus, and body; in your thoughts, words, and deeds. Start with the part of your being that your will and willingness currently have a better hold on. It is the body for some, mental focus for some, emotion and psyche for others. And then as you begin to see yourself get healthier and stronger, and hence happier, apply the realized health, strength, and happiness to choose health toward your whole being, past the part of your being you started with, and then you see very quickly that infinite happiness is you, supreme wisdom is you, indomitable power is you, and that you are the sole (soul :) ) Universe potential, and have always been!Unconditional health be you always! Vijayi Bhava! Victory be yours!Amma, ‘A Iyer in Jose’s Well
author: Sheshadharananda, Burned out

quote: If you want to change your life for the better, simple, just choose health for yourself and others, every step, every mode, and every turn; in your psyche, emotions, mental focus, and body; in your thoughts, words, and deeds. quote: The black, the white, the brown, the red, the yellow, the hetero, the homo, the trans, the poor, the rich, the literate, the illiterate, the weak, the strong – all are my sisters and brothers. My life is their life. And till the last breath in my body, I shall be serving you all with all the power in my veins. And beyond death, my ideas shall be serving you for eternity.
author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

quote: When you fall short of your goals and dreams ask yourself is it your mindset, perspective, expectations, effort, approach, acceptance, company or a blend of these that needs to change.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Give thanks in all circumstances, for this is God's will for you in Christ Jesus" (1 Thess. 5:18).
author: Bible

quote: Champions realise that defeat - and learning from it even more than from winning - is part of the path to mastery.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: How far we go to seek redemption, but in all these, have we really sacrificed enough to find our peaceful place?
author: rachel kabura

quote: Turn a bad past into a good future.
author: Peter Lopez Jr., Excuses Excuses Which One Is Yours?

quote: I am the thread of unification that goes through humans of all religions, cultures and ideologies while reinforcing their innate sense of one humanity.
author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

quote: I work to make human beings out of human bodies. I work to make conscience out of mindlessness. I work to make Gods out of obedient worshippers.
author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

quote: Give me your soul and I will give you a unified humanity replete with courage, conscience and compassion.
author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

quote: O my brave Almighty Human, with the ever-effulgent flow of courage, conscience and compassion, turn yourself into a vivacious humanizer, and start walking with bold footsteps while eliminating racism, terminating misogyny, destroying homophobia and all other primitiveness that have turned humanity into the most inhuman species on earth.
author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

quote: Sooner or later you will meet the person you are busy becoming and you'll either be celebrating or regretting base on the choices you making today.
author: Nicky Verd

quote: The only way to know if you can ever grab hold of your dreams is to reach for them.
author: Tonny K. Brown

quote: I have found that when you GENUINELY love what you do, time isn’t a factor. As a matter of fact, time doesn’t even exist.
author: Stephanie Lahart

quote: When prayer replace work then poverty takes over
author: Nicky Verd

quote: Poetry has a mysterious way of illustrating the landscapes of life. One can't help but love its audacity to record the journey.
author: L.V. Jones

quote: If size really mattered, a match wouldn’t be able to set a forest on fire.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: There's no need to lay low. Go right ahead and give the world your brilliance
author: Nicky Verd

quote: Planting and harvest don't happen in the same season
author: Nicky Verd

quote: There is an economy in your mindThere is an economy in your mind!
author: Nicky Verd

quote: Sow some good. The soil is ready. Your harvest is guaranteed.
author: Maisie A. Smikle

quote: Each of us has a mountain to climb. To reach the summit you need to understand who you are and what you can do. Without an idea of your strengths and weaknesses you cannot define your personal limits. Survival training helps you figure that bit out. It makes you stronger, more fearless and ultimatley resilient! There is no easy or pain free way to the summit – you just have to endure and climb to it by yourself.
author: Rich Hungerford

quote: The human mind is a magical labyrinth. It is a mystical universe within you, where everything eventually materializes. So be careful of what you put in it. For it is only your thoughts that can decide the possible from the impossible.
author: Ashwini Shenoy

quote: Never let the world take your smile
author: all it will give you in return is a frown.

quote: When the struggle is over, those that have distance themselves from you will line-up to re-introduce themselves!
author: Nicky Verd

quote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
author: ~ Jimi Hendrix (1942-1970), musician

quote: Who say mo'?You say mo'?I say mo'Mo' what?Mo' who?Mo' when?More Jesus. Right Now!To stop the fightingBackbiting, interrogatingPropagating, disruptionCorruption and eruption!Disseminate the man...Which man?The man called Jesus.The Son of GodThe MessiahThe Prince of PeaceThe Good ShepherdEmmanuelLord of lordsKing of all kingsAnd Ruler of Everything.So you say mo?Yes I say mo'We all say mo'More of the man called Jesus.
author: Maisie A. Smikle

quote: Seeing is not believing, it is only seeing,”George MacDonald, The Princess and the Goblin
author: George MacDonald, The Princess and the Goblin

quote: Love is like an ocean… You see just the beginning because there is no end.
author: mopana

quote: Success is not a summit to climb, It is an equilibrium where work and life are balanced
author: Kandarp Gandhi, Buddhist Banker : Money can't buy happiness, Wisdom can.

quote: In a life threatening situation, whether terrorism or a rockslide, what kills most people is slowness to react. Regular lives are so safe, so event-less that there is a lack of comprehension when faced with death. It's not necessarily shock. IT's disbelief. It's dismissal. Civilians say to themselves, I've got this wrong, this isn't what I think. But it is, and by the time they've realized, it's too late. And of course sometimes they do in fact have it wrong. They've misread the situation, and they're left embarassed and maybe ashamed. But....." "But they're alive," Mayes finished.
author: Tom  Wood, The Final Hour

quote: If you were happy with all you had, then you’d grow, If the sun and moon could make you glad, then you’d know. With food on your plate and a place to sleep, be thankful and you’ll be given more to keep, Just for now, what you need for now. Feel you are worthy, you will not lack, you’ll enjoy life and love to give back, Forgiving others you forgive yourself, which makes more room to live and be well, Just allow. For every gift you give extends, more love and wealth the heavens send, Again and again, ten times ten, Because you are loved more than you know, your mistakes turn you into a loving soul, You’ll learn how.” Trinity, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea

quote: BELIEVING IS SEEING what you want! Seeing, might be believing, what you don't want! Your inside eyes are your special sight, to create your life in every way, But the environment you see with your eyes creates your thoughts every day. The beliefs that come from outside of you will make more of the same; So to see a change you must think out of the box; this is how you play the game. What you think, see and feel all at once, is how you create your life; Be the observer in your heart and mind, not what will repeat your strife, This will promote a healthy brain, to focus on joy rather than pain, See what you want, as if it is happening NOW, the Little People just showed you how! Because, your imagination is your real tool, no matter what anybody else tells you!The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea

quote: The kingdom of nature has such a job, That can even make a goblin’s heart throb, It’s true, only a handful of people can see. They’re the breath and life of the planet to be, And all this effort is done for a reason, To build energy that creates a plentiful season!The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea

quote: Your real journey starts from the point when you realize that your life, ambition, success, dreams, achievements, future, everything is on your own.
author: Muhammad Talha

quote: Time makes you to run from it so,be quick at your decisions you decide
author: pavankumarguptha

quote: Walang matibay na relasyon kung buhay pa ang mga Kalapating mababa ang lipad...
author: Napz Cherub Pellazo

quote: Stars give so much to the world without demanding payment. Be likewise.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: LOVE is the answer to everything! Seriously! Everything!The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea

quote: You haven't learned anything until you learn to learn everything.
author: Ben Wood Johnson, Sartrean Ethics: A Defense of Jean-Paul Sartre As A Moral Philosopher

quote: Do not memorize the book! but appreciate what realization it will give it to you . . Like Math,the difficult one, it's not about the formula you've known but it's about the result that gives you and which makes value, "experiences, learnings that you should share to others"Takes pride!
author: Bel Arnesto

quote: I don't regret the things I done. I regret not doing things when I had the chance.
author: ISA

quote: It can appear that Ellarie has it hard to be seen and to be heard. Sometimes this is her way and maybe not the best, but it is a way she often uses, I have to confess. Her invisible poke or pinch is to help those believe, in more than just a ghostly story or what the eyes can perceive. The brighter your light shines will give a clue, to the goodness you attract that follows you.”Trinity, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea

quote: You know "HOW' then address it right now.
author: Rajesh Walecha

quote: While they proceedTo and fro, andCome and go Like Spring, SummerAutumn and WinterChastise, Criticize And SlanderJesus still remainsA Wonder
author: Maisie A. Smikle

quote: Always look at the message, not the messenger!”The Little People, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea

quote: The only shores you will never reach in life are those you have allowed yourself to believe, were too far.
author: Tonny K. Brown

quote: Those who believe in justice find silence too great a burden to carry.
author: Tonny K. Brown

quote: Love is always reminding me that there is something else left to do
author: Tonny K. Brown

quote: Sad story always end up with a happy ending. Wrong choices end up with a lesson as your tool in life.
author: Napz Cherub Pellazo

quote: What made me become what I am now is just a reflection of how you have made me.
author: Napz Cherub Pellazo

quote: Freedom seeking is the path to coming alive again.
author: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

quote: Freedom is the willingness and ability to choose your own path and experience your life as your true self.
author: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

quote: We all have the innate capacity to feel free.
author: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

quote: If you can choose your way into a cage, you can choose your way out.
author: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

quote: While you cannot always change your situation, you can always change the way you respond to it.
author: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

quote: It only hurts us to love when we do so with expectation. And that’s not really love, anyway. Love has no expectations, no qualifiers, no conditions. Love is pure, untouched by our mind’s demands, untainted by our desperation and fear. Love can only be beautiful. It can only be divine. No, love doesn’t hurt, not when it’s real. Love empowers. It strengthens. It reminds us who we really are and why we’re really here. Love, more than anything else in this entire world, heals us.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: If the wind brushes against you, do not complain; it brushes against everyone.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The sun and stars never apologize for shinning
author: neither should you.

quote: You were not born to impress the world, but to impress the universe.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The insight into the true order of values is not easy to achieve. It is difficult for anyone to prevail in the struggle against the fear, which does not serve an old Goethean advice. In the ideal communion which Goethe draws up in his wandering years, the quaint rule is that their members must never speak of past or future, but only of the present present.Most people sacrifice the day to the day. They are not satisfied with the task of considering and solving the problems they are now posing, but in anxious thoughts they draw down on the burden of coming times. Although we can never take the second step before we have done the first, we always consider the fiftieth or the hundredth. But Johannes Muller's theorem is one of the fundamental principles of life: "Do what is present, and wait, what will."Very many have a strange position on the past, present and future. The past transfigures them, they despair of the future, and the present they fail to miss, by their memories and fears. But the present is the only real thing that does not seize it, never reaches life. That is why we should consciously enjoy every tolerable hour without letting it darken future clouds.
author: Ludwig Reiners in : Norbert Kutschki, Gedanken für den Alltag - Übersetzung: TheWolfmyinnerSoul /Arv

quote: You cannot change others, all you can do is change yourself. If there’s something in your life you don’t like; it’s up to you to alter how you face that issue. Whither it’s something about yourself, or an issue you face; when you change the pattern of energy, you can change the thing causing stress and strife. In doing this, you change the pattern not only in your life, but in how others react to you as well.
author: TheWolfmyinnerSoul - Arven

quote: If your dreams rely on how others deal with you, then you must change those patterns you have control over. The ones within yourself. Make sure you have thought things through and created alternative plans in case others do no react the way you hope they will. Rose colored glasses are great when used to change your view of the negativity around you. But they can be dangerous when you refuse to look at the negative patterns you yourself feed energy into.
author: TheWolfmyinnerSoul - Arven

quote: Be careful what you wish for, be careful how you plan your dreams. Make sure you work out the details and are open to alternatives if things need to be tweaked along the way. Don’t feel as though you must compromise everything, or settle for something less. But don’t be so set in stone that you can not go with the flow of Divine energy as it tries to help you manifest your desires in the best possible pattern of energy for you in this time and space.
author: TheWolfmyinnerSoul - Arven

quote: Managing your life by rumor is the worst thing you can do for yourself. Others are playing a childish game and trying to be the focus of attention. Some are trying to use assumptions to stir the pot and control the game for their own advantage. Don’t allow either group to dictate your reactions!
author: Arven-TheWolfmyinnerSoul

quote: If you can control your actions and reactions, you’ll rule the day. The key for message is …. stay in balance, Mind/Body/Spirit and you will spend the day in celebration of abundance, friendship and joy.
author: Arven-TheWolfmyinnerSoul

quote: Being a friend means knowing how to keep a confidence. Knowing when to be supportive and when to be quiet and show compassion. Sometimes saying nothing at all is the best thing you can do, because all that’s really needed is a hug.
author: Arven-TheWolfmyinnerSoul

quote: Prayer is the best way to hug those who are far away.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A boy was regarded King to be, in a land only a child could see. We admit it could be a difficult task, just in case you are inclined to ask, for those who would even vaguely begin, to remember the child that comes from within, of a modern world still hardened by past and rules that can make you grow up fast. Yet into the imagination, we hope you escape, from beliefs that your life may potentially shape; try to let go of what you normally resist, while exploring the way nature and a boy co-exist.” See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: Our traditions teach us the past is not forgot, yet the past repeats the future believe it or not. If we dwell on the negative, we continue to make, an unhealthy life we must never forsake. Our fairy ring teaches us cause and effect, what we give to the world, returns to us direct!”Chepi, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: You might just be compelled to hear, that there is folklore about a boy so dear, a legend the fairies readily discern, of a good King’s rule upon his return. A boy, a boy is in front of me, I know not who this human could be. I will just become a part of this tree! Unless he cries a desperate plea, I shall then be allowed to reach out to thee.”Deetkatu, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: My head says forget it, my heart says I’ll regret it, and what my stomach tells me, I should not ignore. Oh no, I gotta go, give me a leave, not your sleeve! I know this will cease, when I feel peace. So I will help a boy, come to Joy, a risk I shall take, it’s no mistake, my stomach tells me so.” Deetkatu, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: Now Arthur, if humans could learn to gaze with their eyes or use their special sight, they would realize there is more to seeing than just what is in front of them!” Den the Wise Oak Tree, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: When you are open and aware, it allows for all magical possibilities! We, here in the forest, can see all that goes on in our environment on the surface; but we have true awareness that sees beyond the shallow! This belief comes from the depths of wisdom that there is more than meets the eyes!”Den the Wise Oak Tree, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: When you truly believe in the desires of your heart, they show themselves to you, creating a world you wish to see. When you believe in the bad things of your world, they also become visible, weighing on your heart, which makes peace hard to find.” Den the Wise Oak Tree, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: Whatever ‘I AM,’ you are! You are, I AM, not me you see, but you are ‘I AM’ is what will be!”Deetkatu, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: Bad in good and good in bad, see the life you could have had? Your life is the keyhole, and you are the key, don’t look back, NOW choose to be happy!”Deetkatu, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: Be aware! Bad things can happen and the bigger they are, the greater the test. You can learn from them or pity yourself and focus on the negative, which will never get you out of the lesson, remember you hold the key!”Den the Wise Oak Tree, See the little people…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport

quote: When I am happy and when I really focus, I can! Whatever I dream of with my thoughts becomes a part of my world, my plan.”Deetkatu, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: Sometimes humans just don't listen, they ‘take’ to fill a space that’s missin’!Deetkatu, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: Grampa says the grass is not greener on the other side. All grass changes with the seasons, it grows, it browns, and it can die if you do not nurture it. You must accept the changes, yet the grass is as green as you make it right here and now! Going from one meadow to another does not change the season! Or the meadow!Deetkatu, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport

quote: You mean to tell me that you have made a human friend? It could be dangerous and I must urge it to end! Deetkatu, where is your sense?” Grampa's tone was abruptly tense.Grampa Foster, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: Being in our secret place brings much peace and the more we go there, the more it will increase. Now we let it all go by, have faith in what we see and it IS what will be.”Gramma Tenanye, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: Be mindful of the thoughts and emotions you put out, they will only project back to you like a boomerang, no doubt!”Grampa Foster, See the Little People…An Enchanting Adventure
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, See the Little People...An Enchanting Adventure

quote: If you say something over and over and over again you may just start to believe it. If you truly do believe it, you can be sure you will receive it.Selkie Anne, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea

quote: Grampa Foster always says that every single experience has something to teach us about ourselves. “So don’t expect to get too comfortable or you’ll never learn a thing!”Trinity, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea
author: Chris DiSano Davenport, The Little People Journey into the Mystic Sea

quote: Reach out and help others. If you have the power to make someone happy, do it. Be a vessel, be the change, be the difference, or be the inspiration. Shine your light as an example. The world needs more of that.
author: Germany Kent

quote: There is no greater prize than a quiet, peaceful mind.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: The journey of the Freedom Seeker isn’t always easy. But it is essential, and it is urgent, for it is the path to coming alive again.
author: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

quote: Notice how extraordinary your life truly is. It’s filled with love. Open your heart to it.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: If you take society’s definition of knowing oneself, you will become lost in the many translations.
author: Grace Sara

quote: The Holy Scripture reveals spiritual realities.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Let your love for books grow, as your confidence grows too.
author: Liza Osae-Kwapong

quote: The universe does not shed tears when a star falls from the sky
author: it gives birth to another one.

quote: I am blessed out! I make time for joy every day. I commit to seeking healthy pleasure and reveling in it.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Having something is not always better than not having it.
author: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

quote: It’s dangerous to be grateful for the cage that traps you.
author: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

quote: If you’re trapped in a cage, you don’t want to start being grateful for the protection of the bars. You need to be grateful that there are gaps in between them so you can see what’s on the other side.
author: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

quote: Escape is a process, not a pill.
author: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

quote: You have the power to choose joyful living through your thoughts, actions, and choices.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: People are capable at anytime in their lives,of doing what they dream of
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: All around the world, people are exuberantly laughing right now.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: You have a nearly a 0% chance of affecting change in others attitudes, behaviors, and skullduggery. However, you have a 100% chance of affecting your own attitude, behavior, resiliency, and reaction to all things within your direct ability to shape the outcome.
author: Donavan Nelson Butler, Master Sergeant US Army

quote: Joy is all around me, and I celebrate it all.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: It is perhaps, its ability to penetrate the multidimensional layers of the human condition at all, that makes poetry and art so valuable in today's modern age.
author: Atalina Wright, Unbound

quote: Don't dwell too long on the past, forgive and let it go. Too many hours have been wasted on old regrets and sorrow.
author: Atalina Wright, Unbound

quote: Wonder is all around us, when we know how to look. It's often in the simple spaces; a meadow, a stream, an unturned rock.
author: Atalina Wright, Unbound

quote: Love cannot be contained, love is destined to transcend and change.
author: Atalina Wright, Unbound

quote: What are we before love? But thoughts floating upon a sea. Searching for a shore to explore, to gaze into infinity.
author: Atalina Wright, Unbound

quote: You played my heart as it was meant to be played, a little, then all at once.
author: Atalina Wright, Unbound

quote: When we're together, I'm a leaf floating on a pond. Weightlessly in love.
author: Atalina Wright, Unbound

quote: Every piece of you is a living library of creation. The deeper I look, the more I see.
author: Atalina Wright, Unbound

quote: Don't value your self worth by others or external things but by appreciating who you are within. And if you must measure your success do it not by what you have gained personally but what you have contributed to a wider benefit. - Rasheed Ogunlaru
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Don’t carry the weight of the world on you Jace. It’s too heavy for even a Herondale to bear.
author: Cassandra Clare, City of Heavenly Fire

quote: I choose spiritual romance. I am sacred!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: I am joyfully one with all existence.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Your love is the essence of divine artistry. Use prismatic hues to express it and shower it everywhere!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: I embrace my sensitivity and let it enhance my joy every day.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Being sensitive is a gift that fosters peace. Help create a kinder, gentler world by embracing it.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: My life guides offer my comfort, solace, joy, love, and bliss. I gratefully accept it, as needed, for my highest good and the highest good of all life.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: A benevolent universe of spirit helpers sits at the ready to support your unfolding joy. All you have to do is ask.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: I trust life and live deep bliss and comfort in each moment.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: I am creative, blissful, and blessed!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Every peak and valley of your life has led you to deeper understanding and, ultimately, growing compassion.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Acknowledging your blessings makes them proliferate.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Embrace the sweetness of life like a gift honeycomb from the hive.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Spiritual romance is based on mutual respect and kindness.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: I let my love for all flow through art, and I express how I feel.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: We are all the same being. Union is the true reality of existence.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: The natural world sustains me and fills me with joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Go outside, wherever you are, and appreciate each drop of water, each flower, each architectural work of art.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: I let giving fill me with joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Every kind word or action has an equal reaction. What you put out comes back to you. Why not make it caring and joyful?
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: I am bold and daring. I go after what I want and create massive joy in my life.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Be brave and create the life of your dreams. Dare to strive for the spectacular.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: I am a storyteller and experience the bliss of writing.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Tell the story of your life with grace and candor. Sharing your wisdom helps others and delivers deep satisfaction.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: I am emotionally fluid and safe.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Happiness is not a choice, or we’d all be happy. Let’s stop putting unnecessary pressure on ourselves to be happy all the time, and to pretend we can choose to be happy whenever we want. That’s not how life works. Sure, we can make choices that reflect a commitment to our well-being, and the more of these choices we make, the more likely we are to find ourselves feeling good more often. Healthy choices are within our power, and are important. But we can’t choose happiness, and we just set ourselves up for failure by believing we can. Life is more than happiness, anyway. It’s okay to feel all the things we feel. It’s human. There’s no shame in wanting to be happy, of course. We all want to be happy. But rather than try to choose happiness, maybe we can choose to being kinder and more loving. That we can do. We can work hard to take better care of ourselves, and better care of each other. If we do these things, and we remember that we are all connected, all brothers and sisters, all worthy of love, maybe then happiness will choose us a little more often.

quote: Between the MileI have always counted the miles.Sometimes they came quick,Other times slow.The distance between things,The way I could know.Close could feel far,And far could feel near.The miles that passed too quickly,The ones I ran out of fear.They weren’t all the same,So I had been told,The unmarked trails,And the days I was bold.Some miles went down,Spiraling so low,When I was afraid to look forward,There was nowhere to go.The sunset came fast,And the day turned to night,But the trails could be endless,If I looked at them right.Everything I knew,All I was told,The conversations left behind,The people who grew old.When the miles stretched out before me,I wanted to sew them at the seam,Looking forward and then back,Holding everything in between.
author: Jacqueline Simon Gunn

quote: Peace gives you the world, laughter gives you the sky, joy gives you the world, and love gives you the universe.

quote: Satan can't steal your joy unless you let him.

author: don't spend your life dreaming of a vision with a journey you are not willing to start.

quote: Being in the Word is Far More Important than Being in a Ministry...If You Are in a Ministry Without Being in the Word, You have Lost it.

author: the most beautiful tongue hasn’t been heard yet

quote: How inspiringly beautiful it is to bloom inspite of life’s storms.

author: Kristin Anderson Cetone, Buckaroo Buckeye: A Little Nut with Big Dreams

author: it thinks. Hear your heart
category: it speaks. Hearken to your soul

quote: The World of Today, Few People have Everything while Many People have Nothing.

quote: Count your blessings take care of the people you love.'Happy father's day to all the greatest POP,DAD,KIN in the world.

quote: Hold yourself back, or heal yourself back together. You decide.

quote: What it is, it is.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Definitely, some will doubt you, but don’t doubt yourself. Surely, some will hate your mission, but don’t hate your vision. Truly, some will envy your vision, but don’t change your vision. Surely, some will mock at your direction, but don’t neglect your focus. Surely, you shall meet obstacles, but learn to overcome all obstacles with wit. Frankly, some will say what they want to you, but say what is inspiring to yourself. Obviously, you shall meet fear, but learn to shake your fears. In fact, there shall be moment of drought, but learn to go with tenacity and an indomitable staying power. You may meet the rocks, but climb the rocks with fortitude to the apex, and you shall feel the fresh air! Truly, you shall hear so many things, but know what to listen to. Surely, some will misunderstand you, but learn to understand yourself. You may definitely have so many things to do, but mind what is more important and weightier. There is no great journey without issues, but learn to overcome all issues, and get to the end of the journey with distinctive footprints and a good sense of fulfillment. You were born for a purpose! Live it; achieve it! God is waiting for you at the finishing line; get there with a pleasant story for a glory!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: She believed she couldn't, so God did.
author: Lara Casey, Cultivate: A Grace-Filled Guide to Growing an Intentional Life

quote: I can't change yesterday, but I can sure mess up today.
author: Charlton Heston, In the Arena: An Autobiography

quote: Light another’s path and the universe will light your own.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: I am not too worried about the many changes in today's society, but I am rather overly concerned about societies refusal to change from it destructive path!
author: Lawrence Sankar, Beloved Hear My Heart

quote: Life is brighter than we think and better as we are. We just need to open our eyes and follow our heart.” ― Nina Hrusa
author: Nina Hrusa

quote: Life is brighter than we think and better as we are. We just need to open our eyes and follow our heart.
author: Nina Hrusa

quote: If you don't discover your passions, purpose and power, then you will pursue the roles assigned by other people's scripts. You will lose the success and potential afforded by new opportunities if you don't know your own priorities and preferences. Your strength is in your uniqueness.If you lose yourself just to get along with others, then you have nothing original to offer this new year of progress and prosperity. Stay true to yourself. Where there is a vision, there is always a provision
author: Mlungisi Simelane

quote: We can overcome our fears if we remember that life does not demand more than what it gives. We can't waste time and energy comparing what we've been given, because we must reserve that energy for unloading to our God- given potential. The gifts may not be the on the same dimension or degree but that's okay. It may not be on the same level as everyone else's, and that's okay because we are not called to compete. We are called to maximize the fullness of what God has uniquely entrusted to us. Run your own race, there are victories to be won
author: Mlungisi Simelane

quote: God will open doors for you when He knows you are ready. Until then, keep sowing and dont grow weary. The time of your harvest is upon God's schedule. Be faithful, endure trials and one day you will wake up in the land of abundance. Dont give up on God as He wont give up on yo
author: Mlungisi Simelane

quote: Don't let disappointments & mistakes of the past control and direct your future. Your source of direction and everything is in Christ Jesus
author: Mlungisi Simelane

quote: Dont ever let anybody throw you away. You are not junk. When God looks at you, He sees things that everybody else ignores. You are worth so much that it took Jesus to Calvary to salvage and reclaim you. You are a seed of greatness.. Wake up sleeping giant

quote: Quest assignments are never wrong.
author: Page Wisher, Land of Infinite Quests: The Quest Courier

quote: My boy, many people know many things. But the things we think we know of others can only become what is known if the others choose to do the doing of making what we think we know known.

quote: God doesn’t call us to comfort
author: He calls us to follow him.

quote: You don’t have to do it all. If unrushing your life feels overwhelming or impossible, consider that it is impossible for you. That’s why we need God. Where you can’t, He already has.

quote: Trees generously share their fruit.Bees generously share their honey.Flowers generously share their perfume. Do likewise.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Always please God FIRSTAll the timeEvery time
author: Maisie A Smikle

quote: To learn, we must first listen.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: SEEK THE ADVENTURES OF THE HEART. THEY LEAD YOU TO ETERNAL BLISS!
author: Helen Heinmiller, The Rustling of Angels: Discovering the Power of Unconditional Love

quote: If your thoughts are higher than your problems, you can fly above them.

quote: So many things people say may seem so good and right
author: you only have to think twice to know what is so good and right!

quote: Inhale every blessing you can think of, and exhale all that is not. Like a fist that can always get tighter, you can always give more. It is essential that you know that in your heart, and you will survive this day as you have so many in the past. You can get through this. I believe in the power of you.

quote: You can't make history going incognito.

quote: ‪I Have No Sympathy For Gossip Boys & Girls ‬

quote: God's grace is everything we need. The seed of all goodness.

quote: The energy of life is force of faith.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Why don't we pay more attention to little children and be nice to each other.

quote: Memories are interesting. Interesting because they are faded yet detailed, pictured yet difficult to decipher, yelling yet mute, beautiful yet dreadful, magical yet logical, and familiar yet new. We listen; we encounter; we observe; we do; we learn; and, we talk. Everything we do or experience becomes our memory. Indeed, memories are interesting.

quote: Use fear to become braver, pain to become stronger, trials to become wiser, and misfortune to become better.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: There's no beauty without difference and diversity. Love unconditionally.

quote: The energy I want to put out in the world is the kind of energy even people that don’t fuck with me appreciate and benefit from. Positivity is all I want in my life.

quote: No one is perfect in their life but those who learn from their mistakes is on right path of perfection

quote: To strengthen the body’s muscles, exercise; the mind’s muscles, read; the heart’s muscle’s, laugh; and the soul’s muscles, love.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: People will never stopThey will say.Stop troubling yourselfThey are not familyThey are just 'PEOPLE
author: Prerna Sharma

quote: Until the fear of separation is faced there can be only a life of illusion, where nothing real can exist. Until this happens there can be no knowing the stillness of peace, which is to change, in the very near future, for all humanity. The illusion of separateness can not continue to exist.

quote: If you rule the air, you are great; the waters, you are extraordinary; the lands, you are remarkable; but if you rule over yourself, you are remarkable.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Ignorance may be light as much as it may be a deemer

quote: Everything happened to find the balance of Life.

quote: I shall never exchange reading for riches.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I want to be the reason you look at your phone when you wake up in the morning and smile

quote: One step at a time I know I will reach my destination of which I consider to be a happier, healthier way of living in mind body and soul.

quote: I was so blissfully lost in her that I didn't have to fight time.
author: Bandile M Matsenjwa

quote: One thing that makes your confidence echoe over negativity is your patience, understanding, ambitions and trust me it makes your accomplishments astonishing
author: Bandile M Matsenjwa

quote: It's always the mind that needs quietening and the heart that needs listening to.

quote: To have faith in God, you must also have faith in His timing....

quote: Never stop dreaming, wake up and chase your dreams.

quote: Semantics are just some antics used by the enemy to get us distracted and off course from the destiny and inheritance that God hand-picked and created specifically for us...

quote: When you are fulfilled within, big problems look small and when you have a vacuum within small problems look big!!!
author: Harrish Sairaman

quote: Don't judge a book by its cover.
author: George Eliot, The Mill on the Floss

quote: Worry soils, even the purest mind.Envy poisons, even the purest heart.Greed sullies, even the purest soul.

quote: We're all a blemished spirit full of censurable faults
author: Netiera Danise, Common Cents: How to Live a Happy Life Without Money? It's Simple, Just Live!

quote: Yes, you can be a dreamer and a doer too, if you will remove one word from your vocabulary : impossible.

quote: Meaning is not what happens, but what you do with what happens.

quote: I am not perfect and I don't pretend to be. My brand is about dealing with life after it happens and not sugar coating the fact that I'm a human who makes mistakes.

quote: To have extreme, laser-like focus, you must be willing to reject a lot of opportunities, even if they sound great.

quote: Life is complicated until complications don't grace it amid amenable aura.

quote: Like Salvador Dali’s paintings of watches melting in the sand, time wanders at its own curious pace whenever you’re on vacation in a foreign country.

quote: Find a way to learn something from every disappointment.
author: Laurie Nadel, Dancing with the Wind: A True Story of Zen in the Art of Windsurfing

quote: Barely halfway back, exhaustion sets in. What if I don’t make it? An edge of panic gets intercepted by a calmer inner voice: Look behind you.
author: Laurie Nadel, Dancing with the Wind: A True Story of Zen in the Art of Windsurfing

quote: Out here on the water, it’s a fine line between feeling in control and losing it altogether.
author: Laurie Nadel, Dancing with the Wind: A True Story of Zen in the Art of Windsurfing

quote: Instead of falling, I am dancing with the wind.
author: Laurie Nadel, Dancing with the Wind: A True Story of Zen in the Art of Windsurfing

quote: Producing obituaries is a way of creating a legacy to remember important people of our times and their contributions. No matter whose obituary it is, I look for something inspirational about each person.
author: Laurie Nadel, Dancing with the Wind: A True Story of Zen in the Art of Windsurfing

quote: Flip a coin. Life or death. Heads or tails. You never know.
author: Laurie Nadel, Dancing with the Wind: A True Story of Zen in the Art of Windsurfing

quote: If there’s a takeaway from working here, it’s an understand that, as bioorganisms, we are a walking time bomb programed for cellular self-destruction. Not if, when.
author: Laurie Nadel, Dancing with the Wind: A True Story of Zen in the Art of Windsurfing

quote: Lucid dreams often feel like this—as if you are observing yourself from a point over your shoulders-arm flexed, hands curving around the boom, breathing, in three dimensional silence.
author: Laurie Nadel, Dancing with the Wind: A True Story of Zen in the Art of Windsurfing

quote: There are two kinds of special events: planned and unplanned.
author: Laurie Nadel, Dancing with the Wind: A True Story of Zen in the Art of Windsurfing

quote: Inside, my spirit is sparkling like foam on the crest of a wave at high tide under a full moon.
